# Russia events by indvst

add_namespace = russia
add_namespace = rcw
add_namespace = rusd
add_namespace = rusfor
add_namespace = orth
add_namespace = rusdem
add_namespace = russoc
add_namespace = russianews
add_namespace = rusdroz
add_namespace = rusdeminfo

#Intro events

country_event = { #History
	id = russia.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1" }
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = psr_coalition
		set_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
		set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	title = russia.1.t 
	desc = russia.1.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_russia_flag_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { tag = RUS }
	option = {
		name = russia.1.a
		country_event = {
			id = russia.2
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1.b
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		country_event = russia.1017
		country_event = {
			id = russia.2
			days = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #History
	id = russia.1017
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1017" }
	title = russia.1017.t 
	desc = russia.1017.d 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.1017.a
		country_event = russia.1018
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1017.b
		country_event = russia.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian economy
	id = russia.2017
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.2017" }
	title = russia.2017.t
	desc = russia.2017.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.2017.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.3
				days = 21
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.5
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #reparations
	id = russia.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.3" }
	title = russia.3.t
	desc = russia.3.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.3.a
		add_stability = -0.24
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_austerity_measures
			days = 365
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.4
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #reparations for Germany
	id = russia.4
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.4" }
	title = russia.4.t
	desc = russia.4.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.4.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = ger_brest_litovsk
			days = 365
		}
	}
}

#Politics
country_event = { #Kerensky
	id = russia.5
	title = russia.5.t
	desc = russia.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_POL_assassination
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_puppet = no
		date > 1936.01.4
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.5.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_kerensky_assasination
					option = RUS_KERENSKY_LIVE_BITCH
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russia.6
			days = 1
		}
		add_ideas = {
			rus_political_instability
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		add_manpower = -1
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
				traits = {}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
				traits = {}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = worldnews.15
					days = 1
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = worldtension.10
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = { #Lives 
		name = russia.5.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_kerensky_assasination
					option = RUS_KERENSKY_DIE
				}
			}
		}
			
		country_event = {
			id = russia.7
			days = 1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER
		set_country_leader_portrait = {
			portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Alexander_Kerensky_I_Lived_Bitch.png"
		}
		set_country_flag = PORTRAIT_PICKER_ACTIVE
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_kerensky_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_global_flag = RUS_I_lived_bitch_flag
		add_ideas = {
			rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.12
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Aftermath of assassination
	id = russia.6
	title = russia.6.t
	desc = russia.6.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Russia_Kerensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.6.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = coalition_power
		clr_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
		clr_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
		end_coalition = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.13
				days = 3
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.10
				days = 4
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.30
				days = 8
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.9
				days = 12
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.14
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.1
				days = 6
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.16
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.3
				days = 75
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.6
				days = 80
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.7
				days = 80
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.8
				days = 85
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.9
				days = 85
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.5
				days = 90
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.10
				days = 90
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.4
				days = 95
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.11
				days = 100
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.100
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.101
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.102
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.103
				days = 55
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.104
				days = 55
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.105
				days = 20
			}
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes	
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			name = RUS_left_kadets_party
			long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 0
				radical_socialist = 6
				syndicalist = 5
				social_democrat = 31
				social_liberal = 8
				market_liberal = 5
				social_conservative = 7
				authoritarian_democrat = 4
				paternal_autocrat = 6
				national_populist = 28
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.21
		set_country_flag = RUS_SEN
		activate_mission = RUS_form_coalition
	}
}

	id = russia.7
	title = russia.7.t
	desc = russia.7.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Russia_Kerensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.7.a
		add_stability = -0.14
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.103
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.8
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Panic in Petrograd
	id = russia.8
	title = russia.8.t
	desc = russia.8.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Russia_Kerensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.8.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Panic_Petrograd
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.104
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Gorgulov Trial
	id = russia.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.10"}
	title = russia.10.t
	desc = russia.10.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_trial
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.10.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_GOR_ALIVE
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = rus_political_instability
				add_idea = rus_political_instability1
			}
			subtract_from_variable = { psr_mp = 10 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_stability = 0.04
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = rus_political_instability
				add_idea = rus_political_instability1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Pardon Gorgulov?
	id = russia.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event.russia.11"}
	title = russia.11.t
	desc = russia.11.d
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_event
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Boris Savinkov"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
		has_country_flag = RUS_GOR_ALIVE
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 5
	}
	
	option = {
		name = russia.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.12
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	
}
country_event = { #Gorgulov Coups Savinkov
	id = russia.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event.russia.12"}
	title = russia.12.t
	desc = russia.12.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_army_event
	option = {
		name = russia.12.a
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Pavel Gorgulov"
			desc = "POLITICS_GORGULOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Gorgulov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = scythianism_subtype
		}
		set_country_flag = savinkov_dead
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_The_Vozhd_Is_Dead
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.28
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Power Struggle
	id = russia.28
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event.russia.28"}
	title = russia.28.t
	desc = russia.28.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.28.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_gorgulov_party_long
			name = RUS_gorgulov_party
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Pavel_T_Gorgulov_hog_npo
			RUS_Ivan_Kolesnikov_for_npo
			RUS_Konstantin_P_Voskoboinik_eco_npo
			RUS_Pyotr_Tokmakov_sec_npo
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
		set_country_flag = RUS_GORGULOV
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_savinkov_successors_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_GOR
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.7845
				days = 2
			}
		}

	}
	option = {
		name = russia.28.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Viktor Abakumov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Viktor_Abakumov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = savinkovism_subtype
			traits = { vozhd }
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Viktor_S_Abakumov_hog_npo
			RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
			RUS_Aleksey_I_Putilov_eco_pau
			RUS_Viktor_S_Abakumov_sec_npo
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
		set_country_flag = RUS_ABAKUMOV
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_savinkov_successors_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_siloviki
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.28.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
			name = RUS_solidarist_party
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Viktor Baydalakov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Viktor_Baydalakov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = solidarism_subtype
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Viktor_M_Baydalakov_hog_npo
			RUS_Aleksey_N_Tolstoy_for_npo
			RUS_Arkadiy_P_Stolypin_eco_npo
			RUS_Anatoliy_MacReady_Stenroos_sec_npo
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma } }
			set_country_flag = disable_duma
		}
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
		set_country_flag = RUS_SOLIDARISTS
		clr_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA		
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_russia_nsnp_democratic_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.606
			days = 2
		}
	}
}

				id = russia.49
				days = 25
			}

				ruling_party = social_democrat
				election_frequency = 47
				elections_allowed = yes
			}

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Questions of bolsheviks
	id = russia.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.16"}
	title = russia.16.t
	desc = russia.16.d 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.16.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = bolsheviks_allowed
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_country_flag = appease_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_country_flag = fight_nationalists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = appease_nationalists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = fight_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				AND = {
					has_stability < -0.29
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.015
		}
		clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = bukharinist_subtype
			}
		}	
	}	
	option = {
		name = russia.16.b
		custom_effect_tooltip = red_terror
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = appease_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = fight_nationalistss
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_country_flag = appease_nationalists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_country_flag = fight_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_ALONE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				AND = {
					has_stability > -0.3
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = rus_political_instability
			add_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.999
				days = 2
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		
		
	}
}
###Black Monday
country_event = { #Black monday hits russia
	id = russia.20
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event.russia.20"}
	title = russia.20.t 
	desc = russia.20.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.20.a
		add_ideas = rus_black_monday
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_monday
		RUS_reduce_german_influence = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russia.21
			days = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.56
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Black monday hits russia
	id = russia.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event.russia.21"}
	title = russia.21.t 
	desc = russia.21.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.21.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
				}
			}		
		}
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_Duma_Plan
		set_country_flag = RUS_black_monday_duma_plan
		if = {
			limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
				}
				RUS_increase_plsr_pop = yes
				RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
			}
			RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.21.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
					}
				}
			}
		}
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_Senate_Plan
		set_country_flag = RUS_black_monday_senate_plan
		if = {
			limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
			RUS_increase_lkdp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_rkdp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_vns_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_ep_pop = yes
		}
	}
}

		add_stability = 0.02
		add_war_support = 0.05
		hidden_effect = {

				id = russia.23
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Unlock foreign policy
	id = russia.23
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.23 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = unlock_foreign
		}
	}
	title = russia.23.t
	desc = russia.23.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}

	option = {
		name = russia.23.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_foreign_tooltip
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = -0.05
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 2 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 217 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 2 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = nsp_in_power
						has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_syn
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
						rsdrp_in_power = yes	
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = rusdem.109
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.23.b
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_foreign_tooltip
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.05
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 0 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 217 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 0 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = nsp_in_power
						has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_syn
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
						rsdrp_in_power = yes	
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = rusdem.109
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia.26
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.26"}
	title = russia.26.t 
	desc = russia.26.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russia.25.a
		add_stability = 0.06
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Senate_Plan
			}
			if = {
				limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
				RUS_increase_lkdp_pop = yes
				RUS_increase_rkdp_pop = yes
				RUS_increase_vns_pop = yes
				RUS_increase_ep_pop = yes

			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = rus_black_monday_senate_5
					add_idea = rus_black_monday_senate_6
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = rus_black_monday_senate_5
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = rus_black_monday_senate_6
					days = 365
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
					}
					RUS_increase_plsr_pop = yes
					RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
				}
				RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
				RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
				RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = rus_black_monday_duma_5
					add_idea = rus_black_monday_duma_6
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = rus_black_monday_duma_5
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = rus_black_monday_duma_6
					days = 365
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.27
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Recovery
	id = russia.27
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.27"}
	title = russia.27.t 
	desc = russia.27.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.27.a
		add_stability = 0.025
		add_political_power = 100
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_black_monday_duma_6
			}
			remove_ideas = rus_black_monday_duma_6
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = rus_black_monday_senate_6
		}
	}
}

					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_ALONE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = fight_socialists
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		
		country_event = {
			id = russia.31
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.30.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 65
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				AND = {
					has_stability < -0.2
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = appease_socialists
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.012
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.012
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russia.31
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Unlock Military
	id = russia.53
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.53" }
	title = russia.53.t
	desc = russia.53.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.53.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_military_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = unlock_military
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = nsp_in_power
						has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_syn
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
						rsdrp_in_power = yes	
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = rusdem.109
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia.59
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.59" }
	title = russia.59.t
	desc = russia.59.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.59.a
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_actual_major = yes
				has_socialist_government = no
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = GER
						tag = JAP
						tag = SOV
						tag = TRM
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.64
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Investing in the future
	id = russia.69
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.69" }
	title = russia.69.t
	desc = russia.69.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.69.a
		set_country_flag = future_invest
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = infrastructure
						size < 5
					}
					region = 147
					state = 580
					state = 581
					state = 262
					state = 397
					state = 644
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 4
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = infrastructure
						size < 5
					}
					region = 147
					state = 580
					state = 581
					state = 262
					state = 397
					state = 644

			}

				type = infrastructure
				level = 4

			}
		}

			limit = {

				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = infrastructure
						size < 5
					}
					region = 147
					state = 580
					state = 581
					state = 262
					state = 397
					state = 644
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {

				level = 4
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}

				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}

					}

				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = arms_factory
						size < 2
					}
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.69.e
		set_country_flag = future_invest

			limit = {
				NOT = {

country_event = {
	id = russia.101
	title = russia.101.t
	desc = russia.101.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.101.a
		add_ideas = RUS_socialization_of_land
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_Rural_Obschinas_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_state_category = four
						has_state_category = three
						has_state_category = two
						has_state_category = one
					}
				}
				add_state_modifier = {
					modifier = {
						local_resources_factor = 0.15
						local_supplies = 0.3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
			40 = {
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
			20 = {
				random_owned_state = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = infrastructure
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Compromise?
	id = russia.108
	title = russia.108.t
	desc = russia.108.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russia.108.a

			factor = 10
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_zenzinov
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.108.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_tsereteli
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_psr
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_kdp
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.108.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_rsdrp
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = -1 }
	}
}
country_event = {#Compromise?
	id = russia.109
	title = russia.109.t
	desc = russia.109.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.109.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_psr_reform
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_kdp
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_rsdrp
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = -1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 8
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.110
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.109.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_kdp_reform
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_psr
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.110
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.109.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_menshevik_reform
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_psr
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.110
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Coalition Secured
	id = russia.110
	title = russia.110.t
	desc = russia.110.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.110.a
		set_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition_to_remove
		RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition
		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes		
		set_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_zenzinov }
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Zenzinov_hog_sde
			add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_sec_sde
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_tsereteli }
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_hog_sde
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Zenzinov_eco_sde
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Zenzinov_eco_sde
			add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_sec_sde			
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Find_A_Compromise
		set_variable = { rsdrp_mp = rsdrp_total_mp }
		senators_support_calc = yes
		
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 15 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_coalition = 15 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = -15 }
	}
}
country_event = {#Coalition Failed
	id = russia.111
	title = {
		text = russia.111.t.kdp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = russia.111.t.psr
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = russia.111.t.rsdrp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.111.d.kdp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.111.d.psr
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.111.d.rsdrp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.111.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition_to_remove
		RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		
		set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition_to_remove
		RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Find_A_Compromise
		mp_support_calc = yes
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_coalition = -15 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = 15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.111.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Find_A_Compromise
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_coalition = -5 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = 5 }
	}	
}

country_event = {#End Democracy
	id = russia.113
	title = russia.113.t
	desc = russia.113.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.113.a
		add_stability = -0.03
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_political_instability
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = rus_political_instability
				add_idea = rus_political_instability1
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia.114
	title = russia.114.t
	desc = russia.114.d 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.114.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_political_power = -50
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.114.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
		add_manpower = -1
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
					}
				}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.128
				days = 14
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
				}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.129
				days = 14
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Retire
	id = russia.131
	title = russia.131.t
	desc = russia.131.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.131.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		clr_country_flag = PORTRAIT_PICKER_ACTIVE
		set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		set_country_flag = RUS_SEN
		activate_mission = RUS_form_coalition
		RUS_setup_president_romanov = yes
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.147
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.131.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Military
			}
			add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 25 }
			add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = 3 }
			country_event = {
				id = russia.120
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_Appease_Military }
			}
			random_list = {
				45 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russia.141
						days = 1
					}
				}
				15 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russia.142
						days = 1
					}
				}
				40 = {
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.131.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Military
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		add_stability = -0.08
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_political_instability1
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = rus_political_instability1
				add_idea = rus_political_instability
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 25 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = -8 }
	}
	
}

	desc = russia.134.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russia.134.a #Thus unto all enemies of the state!
		add_stability = 0.08
		add_manpower = -20000

			name = "Boris Kamkov"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
		}
		set_country_flag = leftists_purged
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.118
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.135
				days = 60
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_RRF
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
		}
	}

country_event = {#Elections
	id = russia.121
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_1937_election = yes }	
		set_country_flag = rus_elections_1937_over
	}	
	title = russia.121.t
	desc = russia.121.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.121.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rsdrp_victory
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		set_country_flag = rus_socialists
		add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_hog_sde
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_M_Nikitin_for_mli
			RUS_Boris_I_Nikolayevsky_eco_sde
			RUS_Fyodor_I_Dan_sec_sde
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mensheviks_party
			long_name = RUS_mensheviks_party_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_rsdrp_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		country_event = russia.1210
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_kdp_victory
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		country_event = rusdem.23
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = rus_memories_of_rev
				days = 600
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			name = RUS_left_kadets_party
			long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
		}
		clr_country_flag = snap_elections
		country_event = russia.1210
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_vns_victory
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_vns_ep_victory
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		add_ideas = RUS_Vasiliy_V_Shulgin_hog_sco

			RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco

			}

				days = 600

			RUS_Pyetr_N_Savitskiy_sec_ade
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = rus_memories_of_rev
				days = 600
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			name = RUS_left_kadets_party
			long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
		}
		clr_country_flag = snap_elections
		country_event = russia.1210
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_rsdrp_victory
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_kdp_victory
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_victory
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_democratic_block_victory
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.121
				days = 1825
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.f
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nrpr_victory
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		set_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		add_ideas = {

			RUS_Aleksandr_Antonov_eco_npo
			RUS_Emma_Dikgof_Derental_sec_npo
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		add_stability = 0.1
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}

		}

			remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = rus_memories_of_rev
				days = 600
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_nrpr_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {

			name = RUS_left_kadets_party
			long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
		}
		country_event = russia.1210

country_event = {#Kerensky arrested
	id = russia.141
	title = russia.141.t
	desc = russia.141.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.141.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_country_flag = kornilov_supported_us
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		set_country_flag = RUS_kornilov_coup
		add_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_hog_pau
		
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Lavr Kornilov"
			desc = "POLITICS_LAVR_KORNILOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Lavr_Kornilov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SEN
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demonstrations
		set_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
		remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Viktor Chernov"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Viktor_Chernov.png"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = social_liberal_subtype
					traits = { RUS_savvy_politician  }
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
				name = RUS_social_liberal_party
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { date < 1936.7.7 }
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.200
					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.50
					days = 5
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
				RUS_Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_eco_pau
				RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
			}
			clr_country_flag = make_kerensky_tree_visible
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
	}		
	
	option = {
		name = russia.141.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_country_flag = kornilov_supported_us
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		set_country_flag = RUS_SEN
		activate_mission = RUS_form_coalition
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demonstrations
		remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		clr_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
		mp_support_calc = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "The Senate"
			desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.1
			days = 7
		}
		hidden_effect = {

				id = russia.16
				days = 15
			}
			#country_event = {
			#	id = rusdem.59
			#	days = 70
			#}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.522
				days = 85
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long

			}
			clr_country_flag = make_kerensky_tree_visible

		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.149.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.150
				days = 15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = unlock_economy
			}
			clr_country_flag = unlock_economy
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = unlock_military }
			}
			set_country_flag = unlock_military
		}
		add_stability = 0.075
		army_experience = 50
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_russian_army
		country_event = russia.54
	}
}

	}

country_event = { #Kerensky
	id = russia.152
	title = russia.152.t
	desc = russia.152.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_POL_assassination
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_puppet = no
		date > 1936.01.4
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.152.a
		country_event = {
			id = russia.6
			days = 1
		}
		add_ideas = {
			rus_political_instability
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		add_manpower = -1
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		clr_country_flag = make_kerensky_tree_visible
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
				traits = {}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
				traits = {}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = worldnews.15
					days = 1
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = worldtension.10
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Kerensky Retires?
	id = russia.153
	title = russia.153.t
	desc = russia.153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_subject = no
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
		}
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Senate }
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Soc_Lib_Dictator }
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Military }
		has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.153.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = sorokin_psr_candidate
		country_event = {
			id = russia.154
			days = 4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.153.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}		
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = kerensky_psr_candidate
	}	
}

	title = russia.154.t

		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Pitirim Sorokin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pitirim_Sorokin.png"

		}
	}

###Terror
country_event = {
	id = rusd.998 #Hidden event to fire unrest events
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.999"
	}

	option = { #Political Murder
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_murder }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_murder days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -5 }
		country_event = rusd.1
	}
	option = { #Bombing
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_bombing }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_bombing days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -5 }
		country_event = rusd.3
	}
	option = { #Peasant unrest
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_peasant_unrest }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peasant_unrest days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -5 }
		country_event = rusd.4
	}
	option = { #Agitation in the countryside
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_agitation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_agitation days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -2 }
		country_event = rusd.5
	}
	option = { #Workers' demonstration
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_demonstration }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_demonstration days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -2 }
		country_event = rusd.7
	}
	option = { #Workers' strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike
				has_idea = rus_minor_strike
				has_country_flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -4 }
		country_event = rusd.8
	}
	option = { #General strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike
				has_idea = rus_general_strike_big
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general_malus
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -10 }
		country_event = rusd.13
	}
	option = { #nothing
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 7
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 6 }
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = rusd.999 #Hidden event to fire unrest events
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.999"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.999
				days = 15
				random = 300
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Political Murder
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_murder }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_murder days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.1
	}
	option = { #Bombing
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_bombing }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_bombing days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.3
	}
	option = { #Peasant unrest
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_peasant_unrest }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peasant_unrest days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.4
	}
	option = { #Agitation in the countryside
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_agitation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_agitation days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.5
	}
	option = { #Workers' demonstration
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_demonstration }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_demonstration days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.7
	}
	option = { #Workers' strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike
				has_idea = rus_minor_strike
				has_country_flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		country_event = rusd.8
	}
	option = { #General strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike
				has_idea = rus_general_strike_big
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general_malus
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		country_event = rusd.13
	}
	option = { #nothing
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 7
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusd.1.d

		}
	}

	option = {

	}

country_event = { #Agitation in the countryside
	id = rusd.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.5" }
	title = rusd.5.t
	desc = rusd.5.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.5.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_stability < -0.1
					NOT = { has_idea = rus_negot_peasants }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.6
					days = 60
					random = 720
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.5.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_stability < 0.2
					NOT = { has_idea = rus_negot_peasants }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.6
					days = 60
					random = 720
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Harsh measures
	id = rusd.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.10" }
	title = rusd.10.t
	desc = rusd.10.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.10.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes days = 120 value = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.11
				days = 100
				random = 2400
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Workers give up
	id = rusd.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.11" }
	title = rusd.11.t
	desc = rusd.11.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.11.a
		add_stability = 0.06
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.12
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Factories return to work
	id = rusd.12
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.12" }
	title = rusd.12.t
	desc = rusd.12.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.12.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike_big
			}
			remove_ideas = rus_general_strike_big
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike
			}
			remove_ideas = rus_general_strike
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_minor_strike
			}
			remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #General strike
	id = rusd.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.13" }
	title = rusd.13.t
	desc = rusd.13.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.13.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_minor_strike }
			remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = rus_general_strike
				days = 100
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = rus_general_strike
				days = 100
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.999
				days = 15
				random = 600
			}
		}
	}
}
###Democratic Russia
country_event = { #Acting
	id = rusdem.1
	title = rusdem.1.t
	desc = rusdem.1.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.1.a
		add_stability = 0.02
		hidden_effect = { RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes }
		custom_effect_tooltip = acting_president_tt
	}
} 
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.201
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.201"
	}
	title = rusdem.201.t 
	desc = rusdem.201.d 
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.201.a
		add_stability = 0.07
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		RUS_clear_all_preelection_coalitions = yes
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.25
			days = 60
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.202
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.202"
	}
	title = rusdem.202.t 
	desc = rusdem.202.d 
	fire_only_once = no
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_crisis }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_early_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941 }
		check_variable = { RUS.popular_support = 0 }
		has_country_flag = rus_election_1936
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.202.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		set_country_flag = RUS_political_crisis
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.201
			days = 5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.203
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.202"
	}
	title = rusdem.203.t 
	desc = rusdem.203.d 
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		OR = {
			AND = {
				date > 1937.6.6
				NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
				check_variable = { party_popularity@national_populist < 0.05 }
			}
			AND = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Solidarist_Withdrawal
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Seek_Support_Among_Other_Radicals
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Spiridonova_Denounced_NRPR
			}
		}
		psr_in_power = no
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_President_Kerensky }	
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.203.a
		trigger = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
		complete_national_focus = RUS_NRPR_Bankrupcy
		clr_country_flag = savinkov_coup
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.383
				days = 3
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS.party_popularity@national_populist }
				set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.203.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_black_hundredists_are_ready_to_join
					AND = {
						has_government = social_conservative
						RUS_russian_monarch = yes
					}
					AND = {
						has_government = market_liberal
						RUS_russian_monarch = yes
					}
				}
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				name = RUS_chernosot_party
				long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			}
			set_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_Purishkevich_dead
					}
				}
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Vladimir Purishkevich"
					desc = "POLITICS_VLADIMIR_PURISHKEVICH_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_Soviet_Vladimir_Purishkevich.png"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = legionarism_subtype 
					traits = {}
				}
			}
			else = {
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Nikolay Markov"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Nikolay_Markov.png"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = legionarism_subtype 
				}
			}	
			
		}
		else = {
			clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				name = RUS_solidarist_party
				long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.204
				months = 2
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_state = {
					set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS.party_popularity@national_populist }
					set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
				}
			}
		}		
	}
}
