country_event = { #Opposition laws
	id = rusdem.2070
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.2070"
	}
	title = rusdem.2070.t 
	desc = rusdem.2070.d 
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.2070.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_IN_PROGRESS
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.2070
				days = 90
				random_days = 30
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.2070
				days = 365
				random_days = 120
			}
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							psr_in_power = yes
							has_country_flag = psr_coalition
							has_country_flag = psr_banned
							check_variable = { psr_total_mp < 30 }
							has_country_flag = soc_land_blocked
							has_country_flag = soc_land_accepted
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.207
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_government = social_conservative
							has_country_flag = vns_banned
							has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRIVATIZE_RAILROAD_accepted
							has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRIVATIZE_RAILROAD_blocked
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.208						
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							rsdrp_in_power = yes
							has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
							has_idea = RUS_general_education
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.212						
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_socialist_government = yes
							has_government = market_liberal
							has_government = social_conservative
							has_government = authoritarian_democrat
							RUS_russian_monarch = yes
							has_country_flag = monarchy_referendum_accepted
							has_country_flag = monarchy_referendum_blocked
							has_completed_focus = RUS_Towards_Greatest_Aim
							has_completed_focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.209						
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_government = social_democrat
							has_government = social_liberal
							has_government = national_populist
							RUS_russian_monarch = yes
							has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_blocked
							has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
							has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_RSDRP_REFORM_accepted
							has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_RSDRP_REFORM_blocked
							has_completed_focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.210					
				}
			}	
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Snap elections 1936
	id = rusdem.2
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.2"
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_election = yes }	
		set_country_flag = rus_election_1936
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ALO = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
				}
				ALO = {
					country_event = {
						id = alash.220
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			launch_russian_flavour = yes
			RUS_reduce_german_influence = yes
		}	
	}
	title = rusdem.2.t 
	desc = rusdem.2.d 
	fire_only_once = yes 
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date > 1936.05.1
		date < 1936.05.15
		has_country_flag = snap_elections
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	option = { #Wide Popular Front
		name = rusdem.2.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
					has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_wide_popular_front_victory
		}
		set_country_flag = rus_socialists
		country_event = rusdem.23
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.60
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.61
				days = 3
			}
		}
		remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		clr_country_flag = snap_elections
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = { #Wide Popular Front
		name = rusdem.2.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
					has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_popular_front_victory
		}
		set_country_flag = rus_socialists
		country_event = rusdem.23
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.60
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.61
				days = 3
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		clr_country_flag = snap_elections
	}

country_event = { #Candidate from PLSR/NSP
	id = rusdem.3
	title = rusdem.3.t
	desc = rusdem.3.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date < 1936.05.05
		has_country_flag = snap_elections
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.3.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			set_country_flag = plsr_votes_for_socialist
			set_country_flag = nsp_votes_for_socialist
		}
		set_country_flag = lozovsky_rsdrp_candidate
		set_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
	}
}
country_event = { #Candidate from Socialists
	id = rusdem.4
	title = rusdem.4.t
	desc = rusdem.4.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date < 1936.05.05
		has_country_flag = snap_elections
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition
		}			
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.3.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				has_country_flag = socialist_negot
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			set_country_flag = plsr_votes_for_socialist
			set_country_flag = nsp_votes_for_socialist
		}
		set_country_flag = lozovsky_rsdrp_candidate
		set_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.6.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			set_country_flag = plsr_votes_for_socialist
			set_country_flag = nsp_votes_for_socialist
		}
		set_country_flag = gershtein_psr_candidate

	}

			factor = 50
		}
		set_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
		set_country_flag = EP_candidate_exists
	}
}

country_event = { #Candidate from PSR
	id = rusdem.6
	title = rusdem.6.t
	desc = rusdem.6.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date < 1936.05.05
		has_country_flag = snap_elections
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_rsdrp_coalition }
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.6.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				has_country_flag = socialist_negot
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = gershtein_psr_candidate
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.6.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.6.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				has_country_flag = nationalist_negot
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				has_country_flag = clashes_army
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
	}

country_event = { #Senate Appoints President
	id = rusdem.12
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
			log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
		}
	}
	title = rusdem.12.t
	desc = rusdem.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
				has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
				has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_kdp_candidate				
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
					has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_kdp_candidate			
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_avksentiev = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
			}
			RUS_setup_president_chernov = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = tereschenko_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = tereschenko_psr_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = maklakov_vns_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = teslenko_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
					has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
					has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_kdp_candidate				
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = tereschenko_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = tereschenko_psr_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_tereschenko = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = maklakov_vns_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_maklakov = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = teslenko_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_teslenko = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = romanov_vns_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
				has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = romanov_vns_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_romanov = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_yusupov = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
				has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate		
			}
			RUS_setup_president_vernadskiy = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate		
			}
			RUS_setup_president_savitskiy = yes
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}	
}

	id = rusdem.13
	title = rusdem.13.t
	desc = rusdem.13.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusdem.13.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION

					}

					}

					}
					has_game_rule = {

					}
					has_game_rule = {

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
				days = 180
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_chosen_duma_side
			activate_mission = RUS_Senate_Makes_Its_Move
			RUS_setup_senate_duma_conflict_variables = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
			activate_mission = RUS_Senate_Makes_Its_Move
			RUS_setup_senate_duma_conflict_variables = yes
			set_power_balance = {
				id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
				left_side = RUS_savinkov_side
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.13.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}

						rule = RUS_post_assassination

					}

					}

					}

					}
					has_game_rule = {

					}

					}

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}

						rule = RUS_post_assassination

					}
					has_game_rule = {

					}
				}

			days = 180
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_chosen_senate_side

	}

			base = 100

				factor = 0.5
				RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict

			days = 30
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_clear_all_preelection_coalitions = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.25
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.20.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Felix Yusupov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 13
		}
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI

		}
	}

				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM

				}

			long_name = RUS_social_rev_party_long

				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_ep_victory
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_vns_ep_victory
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_Nikolay_S_Trubetskoy_hog_sco
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Georgiy_V_Vernadskiy_for_sli
			RUS_Konstantin_A_Chkheidze_eco_ade
			RUS_Pyetr_N_Savitskiy_sec_ade
		}
		
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #NRPR
		name = rusdem.2.l
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
					has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nrpr_victory
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo

			RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo

			RUS_Emma_Dikgof_Derental_sec_npo
		}

		add_stability = 0.1
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
		}
	}

	id = rusdem.26

		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.2"
		hidden_effect = { 
			RUS_run_senate_election = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		}	
		set_country_flag = RUS_elections_senate_1936
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.26
				days = 1460
			}
		}		
	}
	title = rusdem.26.t 
	desc = rusdem.26.d 
	fire_only_once = no 
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_ABOLISH_SENATE_accepted
			}	
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = rusdem.26.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
				add_idea = RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusdem.27

		set_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941
	}
	title = rusdem.27.t 
	desc = rusdem.27.d 
	fire_only_once = no

		tag = RUS
		RUS = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
					has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored

					has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
					has_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved

				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }			
		}
	}

		name = rusdem.27.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 14
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_government = syndicalist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

			}
		}

	id = rusdem.29
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.2"
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_election = yes }	
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		set_country_flag = rus_elections_1941_over
		clr_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = rusdem.27
				days = 1642
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusdem.2.t 
	desc = rusdem.29.d 
	fire_only_once = no 
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
					has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
					has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
					has_completed_focus = RUS_Black_Tsar
					has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI

					has_country_flag = RUS_GORGULOV
					has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
					has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
					has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
					has_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
					RUS_is_eurasia = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }			
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #PLSR-NSP victory
		name = rusdem.2.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed

			senators_support_calc = yes
		}
	}

				}
			}

		name = rusdem.2.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = psr_banned

			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_victory

				RUS_Ilya_I_Fondaminskiy_for_sde
				RUS_Andrey_D_Sakharov_eco_sli
				RUS_Vladimir_L_Burtsev_sec_sde
			}
		}
			
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_social_rev_party
			long_name = RUS_social_rev_party_long
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = socdem_democratic_socialism_subtype 
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes

country_event = { #PM
	id = rusdem.30
	title = rusdem.23.t
	desc = rusdem.23.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.23.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_socialists_victory
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
				}
			}
			
		}
		add_stability = -0.2
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = syndicalist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
			RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
			RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
		}
	} 
	option = {
		name = rusdem.23.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_socialists_victory
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30

country_event = { #presidential general elections
	id = rusdem.50
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_presidential_elections = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
		}
		log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
	}
	title = rusdem.50.t
	desc = rusdem.50.d
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_plsr_president_victory
			has_country_flag = kamkov_plsr_candidate
		}
		RUS_setup_president_kamkov = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.b
		trigger = {

			}

country_event = { #RSDRP-PSR
	id = rusdem.51
	title = rusdem.51.t
	desc = rusdem.51.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
		has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.51.a
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = kamkov_plsr_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.51.b
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = shteinberg_plsr_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
}

				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_EMPOWER_PRESIDENT_accepted
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_NSP_REFORM_accepted
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = wrangel_vns_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
}

				has_country_flag = nrpr_banned
				NOT = { has_country_flag = nsnp_banned }
			}
		}
	}	
	desc = {

			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }

				has_country_flag = nrpr_banned

			}
		}
	}

	trigger = {

			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA

				has_country_flag = nrpr_banned
				NOT = { has_country_flag = nsnp_banned }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = NSNP_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = vergun_nsnp_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.58.c
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
				has_country_flag = nrpr_banned

country_event = { #Impeachment
	id = rusdem.106
	title = rusdem.106.t
	desc = rusdem.106.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.106.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_IMPEACH_PRESIDENT }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_CHANGING_CONSTITUTION
			set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_IMPEACH_PRESIDENT
			set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_DUMA_LEVEL
			set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_IN_PROGRESS
			Get_initial_RUS_LAW_IMPEACH_PRESIDENT = yes
			activate_mission = RUS_LAW_DUMA_LEVEL_DEADLINE
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Important thing to ask
	id = rusdem.109
	title = rusdem.109.t
	desc = rusdem.109.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.109.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
				}
			}						
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = we_will_go_socialist
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.109.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
				}
			}						
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = we_wont_go_socialist
		set_country_flag = RUS_decided_to_stay_democratic
	}
}

	id = rusdem.114
	title = rusdem.114.t
	desc = rusdem.114.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		has_left_democratic_government = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.114.a
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = UKR
					tag = WHR
					tag = ARM
					tag = GEO
					tag = AZE
				}
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = medium_decrease
			}
			ROOT = {
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = medium_decrease
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		has_elected_government = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.122.a
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_political_power = 15
	}	
}

			popularity = -0.03

			ideology = radical_socialist

		}
	}

country_event = { #PLSR/NSP
	id = rusdem.302
	title = rusdem.302.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.302.d.president
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Solomon Lozovskiy"
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.302.d.notpresident
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Solomon Lozovskiy"
				}
			}
		}
	}	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.302.a
		add_political_power = 5		
	}
}
country_event = { #PLSR/NSP
	id = rusdem.303
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_RSDRP }	
		}
	}
	title = rusdem.303.t
	desc = rusdem.303.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.303.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_idea = RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_syn
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.303.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_syn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				has_idea = RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Army Mutiny
	id = rusdem.304
	title = rusdem.304.t
	desc = rusdem.304.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = rus_election_1936
		has_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
		OR = {
			has_government = totalist
			has_government = syndicalist
			has_government = radical_socialist
			AND = {
				has_government = social_democrat
				has_country_flag = soc_dems_are_socialists
			}
		}
		check_variable = { army_support < 0.5 }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dealt_with_army_mutiny }
		RUS_is_eurasia = no					
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.304.a
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_ideas = RUS_army_mutiny
	}
}

					is_actual_major = yes

					tag = AST
				}
				has_socialist_government = no
			}

				id = rusdem.316
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
	}

	title = rusdem.316.t
	desc = rusdem.316.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusdem.316.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.317
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.316.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				OR = {
					tag = GER
					tag = GEA
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.320
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.317
	title = rusdem.317.t
	desc = rusdem.317.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.317.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.319
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.317.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.318
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
				days = 60
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
				days = 30
			}
		}			
	}
}

			factor = 70
		}

		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = military_access
			active = no
		}

			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = no
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = guarantee
			active = no
		}		
	}

	id = rusdem.321
	title = rusdem.321.t
	desc = rusdem.321.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusdem.321.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.323
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.321.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		clear_embargo_FROM = yes
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.322
				days = 3
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.324
				days = 368
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.322
	title = rusdem.322.t
	desc = rusdem.322.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.322.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { add_ideas = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier_idea }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = 1 }
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits }
				}
				add_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits
			}
		}
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
	}
}

			OR = {

				has_war_with = SOV
			}
		}
	}

		name = rusdem.324.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes

				factor = 1.2
				has_government = market_liberal
			}

				factor = 1.5

				id = rusdem.326
				days = 3
			}
		}

			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8

			}

				has_socialist_government = yes
			}

				factor = 2
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}

		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = 1 }
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.324
					days = 365
				}
			}
		}
	
	}

			}
		}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.326
	title = rusdem.326.t
	desc = rusdem.326.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.326.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = -1 }
		FROM = {
			add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russian_factory_output = -0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russia_consumer_goods_factories = 0.05 }
		}
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits
			}
		}	
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
	}
}

				has_left_democratic_government = yes

			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}

				factor = 2
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}

		FROM = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = -1 }
		}
		add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russian_factory_output = -0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russia_consumer_goods_factories = 0.05 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits
		}
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes	
	}
}
country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.328
	title = rusdem.328.t
	desc = rusdem.328.d
	fire_only_once = no
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_idea = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier_idea
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = 0 }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.328.a
		remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier_idea }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits
		}
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_max_efficiency
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_construction_speed
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_factory_output
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_resource_gain
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_factories
		clear_variable = Foreign_Russian_factory_output
		clear_variable = Foreign_Russia_consumer_goods_factories
	}
}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.344
	title = rusdem.344.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.344.d.rus
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.344.d.sov
		trigger = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.344.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 26
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "Nikolay Bukharin will remain the party leader"
		SOV_increase_bukharin = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.345
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.344.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 26
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "Mikhail Tomsky will become the new party leader"
		SOV_increase_tomsky = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			SOV_Mikhail_Tomskiy_hog_syn
			RUS_Aleksandra_M_Kollontai_for_tot
			RUS_Aleksandr_Shlyapnikov_eco_rso
			RUS_Yuri_Lutovinov_sec_syn
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_tomsky
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = SOV_snspp_party
				long_name = SOV_snspp_party_long
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tomsky
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = SOV_rnsp_syndie_party
				long_name = SOV_rnsp_syndie_party_long
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tomsky.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype 
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.345
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.344.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "Aleksey Rykov will become the new party leader"
		SOV_increase_rykov = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = SOV_Andrey_Zhdanov_sec_rso
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			name = SOV_rnsp_centralist_party
			long_name = SOV_rnsp_centralist_party_long
		}
		
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Rykov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Rykov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = bukharinist_subtype 
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.345
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.344.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 26
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "Sergey Kirov will become the new party leader"
		SOV_increase_kirov = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Sergey_M_Kirov_hog_syn
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Matvey_Skobelev_sec_sco
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_kirov
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Sergey Kirov"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Sergey_Kirov.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = bukharinist_subtype 
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.345
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusdem.349
	title = rusdem.349.t
	desc = rusdem.349.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.349.a
		add_political_power = 5
		set_variable = { RUS_state_senate_turnout = 0.8 }
		set_variable = { RUS_nonconservative_senate_state_turnout = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_conservative_senate_state_turnout = 0.8 }
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 25 }
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 25 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 150 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 153 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 152 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 151 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 149 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 148 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 147 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes		
	}
}

country_event = { #NRPR
	id = rusdem.352
	title = rusdem.352.t
	desc = rusdem.352.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.352.a
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						has_country_flag = nationalist_negot
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.5
						has_country_flag = socialist_negot
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 1.2
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
							value < -0.3
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 1.5
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
							value < -0.5
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusdem.354
						days = 5
					}
				}
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.5
						has_country_flag = nationalist_negot
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						has_country_flag = socialist_negot
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.8
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
							value < -0.3
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.6
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
							value < -0.5
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusdem.353
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

		}

	}

						factor = 1.2
						has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov
					}

						factor = 1.1
						has_country_flag = nationalist_negot
					}

					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 1.1
						check_variable = { party_popularity@national_populist > 0.3 }
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 1.1
						check_variable = { party_popularity@national_populist > 0.4 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusdem.365
						days = 3
					}
				}
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.8
						has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 1.5
						NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov }
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.9
						has_country_flag = nationalist_negot
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.9
						has_country_flag = clashes_peace
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.9
						check_variable = { party_popularity@national_populist < 0.3 }
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.9
						check_variable = { party_popularity@national_populist < 0.4 }

				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution
				}

				name = "Boris Savinkov"
				desc = "POLITICS_BORIS_SAVINKOV_DESC"

				ruling_party = national_populist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			195 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
			219 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
			add_stability = 0.15
			RUS = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_savinkov_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.60
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.61
				days = 2
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

						has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10000
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusdem.381
						days = 1
					}
				}
				30 = {
					modifier = {
						add = -30
						has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10000
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusdem.384
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusdem.380.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusdem.380.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { popular_support < 0.5 }
					check_variable = { army_support  < 0.5 }
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_RCW
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
				}

				id = rusdem.383

			}
		}
	}

		name = rusdem.380.b

				check_variable = { army_support > 0.5 }

country_event = { #Provisional Government
	id = rusdem.383
	title = rusdem.383.t
	desc = rusdem.383.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.383.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			195 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
			219 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_RRF_1
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF_1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_RRF
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 1
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		set_country_flag = provisional_government
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		restore_all_presidential_candidates = yes
		clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
		reset_russian_leaders = yes
		RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_mp = 0 }
		
		set_variable = { var = senate_total value = 150 }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.3
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			name = RUS_solidarist_party
			long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.204
			months = 1
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.21
			months = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS.party_popularity@national_populist }
			}
		}
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.25
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

				}

					rule = RUS_RCW

				}

			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution
			}

		}

			limit = {

			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}

				id = rusdem.386
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned

				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = -0.1
			}

			id = rusd.24
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.386.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.383
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #3RCW
	id = rusdem.387
	title = rusdem.387.t
	desc = rusdem.387.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.387.a
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.388
					days = 2
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -10
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -10
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.389
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #3RCW
	id = rusdem.388
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_death_kornilov
	title = rusdem.388.t
	desc = rusdem.388.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.388.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
						has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					}
				}
				set_nationality = TRM
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_trait = hidden_sympathies
				}
				set_nationality = SOV
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_trait = hidden_sympathies
				}
				set_nationality = TRM
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
						has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					}
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead 
		set_country_flag = Vasiliy_I_Chuykov_dead 
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_D_Bonch_Bruyevich_dead 
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_F_Vatutin_dead 
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_N_Vrangel_dead 
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_Drozdovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Ivan_S_Konev_dead 
		set_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_Rodzyanko_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_P_Arkhangelskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Lavrentiy_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Konstantin_P_Voskoboinik_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_P_Kutepov_dead
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_K_Miller_dead
		set_country_flag = Igor_I_Sikorskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Vyacheslav_Tkachov_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_V_Turkul_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_I_Verkhovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Vasiliy_Kanin_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = junta_subtype
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.375
			days = 2
		}
	}
}

		SOV = { change_tag_from = ROOT }
	}
}

country_event = { #3RCW
	id = rusdem.400
	title = rusdem.400.t
	desc = rusdem.400.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.400.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_ideas = SOV_chaotic_revolution
		load_focus_tree = Russia_Socialist
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_trait = RUS_markov_officer
			}
			set_nationality = RVA
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_id = 412
					has_id = 78820
					has_id = 78821
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		delete_unit_template_and_units = {
			division_template = "Eskadrony Boevoy Organizatsii NRPR"
			disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.414
	title = rusdem.414.t
	desc = rusdem.414.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.414.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes > RUS_rkdp_votes }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Get_Along_With_Liberals_coalition_secured
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_LKDP }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_RKDP }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.414.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes < RUS_rkdp_votes }
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes = RUS_rkdp_votes }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Get_Along_With_Liberals_coalition_failed
		add_political_power = -15
	}	
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.416
	title = rusdem.416.t
	desc = rusdem.416.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.416.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
			}
			set_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition_to_remove
			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition
			}
			set_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition_to_remove
			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
			}
			set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition_to_remove
			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
			}
			set_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition_to_remove
			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.12
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.12
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.04
		}		
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = RUS_soc_land }
	}
}

					name = "Viktor Chernov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}

		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Lev Gershtein"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}

			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {

					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 10
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_social_democrat_party
			long_name = RUS_social_democrat_party_long
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_country_flag = disable_duma

		}
	}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.429
	title = rusdem.429.t
	desc = rusdem.429.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.429.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
					has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Get_Along_With_NRPR
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 403
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 416
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 402
				}
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = rusdem.430
					days = 100
					random = 50
					random_days = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.429.b
		trigger = {
			MON = {
				has_country_flag = MON_soyombo_in_power_flag
				is_subject_of = RUS
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10000 }
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
					has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
				}
			}
			set_nationality = MON
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Get_Along_With_NRPR
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 403
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 416
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 402
				}
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = rusdem.430
					days = 100
					random = 50
					random_days = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = {
	id = rusdem.430
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.430" }
	title = rusdem.430.t
	desc = rusdem.430.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_military_planning

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusdem.430.a
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 402
				}
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 402 }
					retire = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Anton Denikin"
					desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = junta_subtype
				}
			
			}
		}		
	}
}

		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_socdems_rpr
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_rpr_party
			long_name = RUS_rpr_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			name = RUS_rpr_sav_party
			long_name = RUS_rpr_sav_party_long
		}		
	}
}

			RUS_Nikolay_Gredeskul_sec_sco

			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition }
			}

			RUS_add_to_coalition = yes		
		}

			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}

		}

country_event = { #RSDRP
	id = rusdem.452
	title = rusdem.452.t
	desc = rusdem.452.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.452.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
				}
			}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Rafail_Abramovich_hog_sde
			RUS_Nikolay_A_Ulganov_for_sde
			RUS_Nikolay_Sukhanov_eco_rso
			RUS_Vyacheslav_P_Volgin_sec_sde
		}
		set_country_flag = soc_dems_are_socialists
		set_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = psr_coalition
			}
			set_country_flag = psr_coalition_to_remove
			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.452.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = syndicalist_coalition
			}
			set_country_flag = syndicalist_coalition_to_remove
			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
			}
			set_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition_to_remove
			RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Solomon Lozovskiy"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.453
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}	
}

		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }

		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsnp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsnp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsnp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}

country_event = { #RSDRP
	id = rusdem.471
	title = rusdem.471.t
	desc = rusdem.471.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.471.a
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 25 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 25 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 150 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 153 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 152 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 151 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 149 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 148 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 147 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
}

				RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_A_Kharlamov_sec_mli
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_A_Kharlamov_sec_mli
			}
		}

			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_marlibs_kdp_progressives
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			name = RUS_rkdp_progressive_party
			long_name = RUS_rkdp_progressive_party_long
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = market_liberal_subtype

		RUS_remove_from_coalition = yes
		set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes
		mp_support_calc = yes
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes

		set_country_flag = social_conservative_coalition
		RUS_add_to_coalition = yes		
		set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition

		senators_support_calc = yes

			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.05
		}

			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes

			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Pavel_N_Milyukov_dead }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						ruling_only = yes
						name = "Pavel Milyukov"
					}
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Shulgin_sec_sco
			}
		}

				RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Shulgin_sec_sco
			}
		}
	}

					name = "Dmitriy Romanov"

				}
			}

			limit = {

					}

		}
