country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.531
	title = rusdem.531.t
	desc = rusdem.531.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.531.a
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
		set_country_flag = psr_banned
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		set_variable = { plsr_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_final_senators = 0 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_total_mp }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 550 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 553 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_mp = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 552 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_mp = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 551 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_mp = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 549 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_mp = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 548 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_mp = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 547 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_mp = 3 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 150 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 153 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 152 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
				}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 151 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 149 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 148 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 147 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_political_instability
			days = 365
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.532
	title = rusdem.532.t
	desc = rusdem.532.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.532.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_russian_monarch = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_tolerant_empire
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_tolerant_republic
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.535
	title = rusdem.535.t
	desc = rusdem.535.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.535.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_jewish_autonomy
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_jewish_autonomy
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_state = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic  }
			}
		}
		add_ideas = one_and_indivisible
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.535.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		add_political_power = 50
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.535.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_jewish_autonomy
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_jewish_autonomy
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_state = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_russification_policies
	}	
}

		name = rusdem.536.a

			limit = {
				infrastructure > 1
				infrastructure < 4
			}

					local_supplies = 0.15
					state_production_speed_infrastructure_factor = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}

				id = rusdem.563
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.565
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.557.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		country_event = rusdem.556
	}	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.557.f
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_NICK_VISIBLE
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.620
				days = 22
			}
		}
	}	
}

			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_monarchy_votes_yes < 0.6 }
				check_variable = { RUS_monarchy_popular_support > 0.5 }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_referendum_is_rigged
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
	}

		name = rusdem.567.b
		ai_chance = {

			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_monarchy_votes_yes < 0.6 }
				check_variable = { RUS_monarchy_popular_support > 0.5 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.07
	}

country_event = { #Monarchy Referendum
	id = rusdem.568
	title = rusdem.568.t
	desc = rusdem.568.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.568.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Referendum_Fails
		remove_ideas = RUS_socialists_protest_the_referendum
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.512
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.527
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

			country_event = {

		name = rusdem.577.a

		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.578
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.577.b
		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_tsarina_under_house_arrest
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_tsarina_under_house_arrest
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_tsarina_under_house_arrest
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_tsarina_under_house_arrest
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_tsarina_under_house_arrest
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_tsarina_under_house_arrest
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Flavour for monarchy
	id = rusdem.579
	immediate = { clr_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA }
	title = rusdem.579.t
	desc = rusdem.579.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.556.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Kirill_Romanov_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 14
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_Monarch 
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_KIRILL
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
		RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.556.aa
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = Kirill_Romanov_dead
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 14
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_Monarch 
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_KIRILL
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_VLA
		RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.556.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 18
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_Monarch 
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_DMITRIY
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI
		RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.556.bb
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 18
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_Monarch 
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_DMITRIY
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_PAVEL
		RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
	}

country_event = { #Restoration of republic
	id = rusdem.580
	title = rusdem.580.t
	desc = rusdem.580.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.580.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
			name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
		}
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_vns_rnsma_exists }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_vns_rnsma_exists
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = rnsma_evolves }
			clr_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
			clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				name = RUS_solidarist_party
				long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.204
				days = 30
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_state = {
					set_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS.party_popularity@national_populist }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.25
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Tsar flavor
	id = rusdem.581
	title = rusdem.581.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.581.d.kirillovichs
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Kirill I"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Vladimir III"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.581.d.others
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Kirill I"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Vladimir III"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS_russian_monarch = yes
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Anastasia I"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_event_russia_conflict_of_romanovs
	option = {
		name = rusdem.581.a
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = -0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = -0.1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Kirill I"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Vladimir III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.583
					days = 60
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Kirill I"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Vladimir III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Dmitriy III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.582
					days = 15
				}
			}			
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar flavor
	id = rusdem.585
	title = rusdem.585.t
	desc = rusdem.585.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Vsevolod I"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.585.a
		add_stability = 0.07
		add_political_power = 50
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = 0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { army_support_monarchy = 0.03 }
		add_to_variable = { clergy_support_monarchy = 0.08 }
		add_to_variable = { workers_support_monarchy = 0.08 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = SRD
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = SRD
				modifier = RUS_royal_wedding
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = ITA
				ITA = { is_italian_federation = yes	}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ITA
				modifier = RUS_royal_wedding
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar is back
	id = rusdem.590
	title = rusdem.590.t
	desc = rusdem.590.d
	fire_only_once = no
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = DKB
			tag = KUB
			tag = KLY
			tag = MON
			tag = TRM
		}
		is_subject = no
		RUS = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = @ROOT_refused_tsar }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.590.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = KUB
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = TRM
					OR = {
						has_government = social_democrat
						has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = MON
					MON_sternberg_in_power = no
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}	
		RUS = {
			country_event = rusdem.591
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.590.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}	
		add_political_power = 50
		set_country_flag = @ROOT_refused_tsar
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar is back
	id = rusdem.592
	title = rusdem.592.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.592.d.const
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Symbol_Of_Russian_Might }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.592.d.semiconst
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Tsar_Prussian_Constitutionalism }
	}	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_50
		add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 50 }
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 50 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 150 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 153 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 152 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 151 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 149 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 148 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 147 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_50
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 50 }
		add_to_variable = { independent_total_regional_senators = 50 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 150 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 153 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 152 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 151 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 149 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 148 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 147 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 25 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 25 }
		add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 25 }
		add_to_variable = { independent_total_regional_senators = 25 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 150 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 153 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 152 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 151 }
		}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
	}
		if = {
			limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 149 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 148 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 147 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.f
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Tsar_Prussian_Constitutionalism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		
			set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 33 }
			set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 7 }
			set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 5 }
			set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 5 }
		
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 150 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 153 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 152 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 151 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 149 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 148 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 147 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = 3 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}	
}
country_event = { #Tsar
	id = rusdem.593
	title = rusdem.593.t
	desc = rusdem.593.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.593.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 65
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PSR will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "RSDRP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PLSR and NSP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "NRPR will be banned"
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_popular_glorious_empire_tooltip
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_workers_glorious_empire_tooltip
		add_to_variable = { RUS.popular_support_monarchy = -0.25 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS.workers_support_monarchy = -0.5 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.593.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates }
				}
				set_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.595
					days = 2
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.594
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}	
}

		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_workers_glorious_empire_tooltip

			base = 0
		}

	}

country_event = { #Tsar
	id = rusdem.596
	title = rusdem.596.t
	desc = rusdem.596.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Pavel II"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.596.a
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = national_populist }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Presidental check
	id = rusdem.62
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.62" }
	immediate = {
		RUS_clear_all_preelection_candidates = yes
	}
		
	title = rusdem.62.t
	desc = rusdem.61.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_government = paternal_autocrat
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				has_country_flag = RUS_VRA_TSAR
				has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
				has_country_flag = RUS_ABAKUMOV
				has_country_flag = RUS_GORGULOV
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
				has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
				has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
				RUS_is_eurasia = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
	}
	hidden = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.a #appointed by government
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.63
			days = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.c #appointed by population
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_EMPOWER_PRESIDENT_accepted
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_NSP_REFORM_accepted
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { #nsp primaries
				id = rusdem.52
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { #rsdrp primaries
				id = rusdem.53
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = { #psr primaries
				id = rusdem.54
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = { #kdp primaries
				id = rusdem.55
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = { #vns primaries
				id = rusdem.56
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = { #ep primaries
				id = rusdem.57
				days = 60
			}
			country_event = { #nrpr primaries/nsnp primaries
				id = rusdem.58
				days = 70
			}
			#country_event = { #rovs primaries
			#	id = rusdem.59
			#	days = 80
			#}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.50
				days = 100
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.e #appointed by senate
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_ABOLISH_SENATE_accepted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_EMPOWER_PRESIDENT_accepted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_NSP_REFORM_accepted }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { #nsp primaries
				id = rusdem.52
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { #rsdrp primaries
				id = rusdem.53
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = { #psr primaries
				id = rusdem.65
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = { #kdp primaries
				id = rusdem.55
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = { #vns primaries
				id = rusdem.56
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = { #ep primaries
				id = rusdem.57
				days = 60
			}
			country_event = { #nrpr primaries/nsnp primaries
				id = rusdem.58
				days = 70
			}
			#country_event = { #rovs primaries
			#	id = rusdem.59
			#	days = 80
			#}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.66
				days = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #RNSMA coup
	id = rusd.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.19" }
	title = rusd.19.t
	desc = rusd.19.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.19.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_Purishkevich_dead
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Vladimir Purishkevich"
				desc = "POLITICS_VLADIMIR_PURISHKEVICH_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Vladimir_Purishkevich.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = legionarism_subtype 
				traits = {}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_hog_pau
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_sec_pau
			}
		}
		else = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Nikolay Markov"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Nikolay_Markov.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = legionarism_subtype 
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Nikolay_E_Markov_hog_npo
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
				RUS_Nikolay_P_Vladimir_sec_pau
			}
		}
		
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_DROZ
		set_country_flag = RUS_PUR
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.154
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Kornilov coup
	id = rusd.23
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	title = rusd.24.t 
	desc = rusd.24.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusd.24.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_kornilov_coup
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_hog_pau
			RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
			RUS_Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_eco_pau
			RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau
		}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Lavr Kornilov"
				desc = "POLITICS_LAVR_KORNILOV_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Lavr_Kornilov.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = junta_subtype
				traits = {}
			}
		
		
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SEN
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demonstrations
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
		remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RUS
			reset_russian_leaders = yes
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { date < 1936.7.7 }
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.200
					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.50
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			popularity = 0.1

				}

				}
			}
		}

	id = rusd.30
	title = rusd.21.t 
	desc = rusd.21.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusd.21.a

			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
		}

			setup_soviet_russia = yes
			RUS_setup_soviets = yes
		}

			elections_allowed = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 18
				radical_socialist = 54
				syndicalist = 18
				social_democrat = 10
				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
				}
			}
		remove_all_ministers = yes

			RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			RUS_Ivan_N_Smirnov_for_rso
			RUS_Sergey_M_Kirov_eco_tot
			SOV_Andrey_Zhdanov_sec_rso
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.21.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			setup_soviet_russia = yes
			RUS_setup_soviets = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 10
				radical_socialist = 18
				syndicalist = 14
				social_democrat = 58
				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
				}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_hog_sde
			RUS_Aleksey_M_Nikitin_for_mli
			RUS_Matvey_Skobelev_eco_rso
			RUS_Fyodor_I_Dan_sec_sde
		}
	}

country_event = { #Finland seizes Karelia
	id = rusd.31
	title = rusd.31.t
	desc = rusd.31.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		SOV = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_restored_in_transamur } }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.31.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.32
					days = 5
					random_days = 15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.31.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.025
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = rusd.32
	title = rusd.32.t
	desc = rusd.32.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.32.a
		trigger = {
			FIN = { is_in_faction = no }
			FIN = { has_guarantor = no }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = 25
		declare_war_on = {
			target = KAR
			type = annex_everything
		}
		FIN = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.33
				days = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.998
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.32.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.02
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.34
					days = 1
				}
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.998
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusd.33

	title = rusd.33.t
	desc = rusd.33.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.33.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		KAR = { 
			give_military_access = FIN
			declare_war_on = {
				target = FROM
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
		add_war_support = 0.1
		add_ideas = KAR_finnish_intervention
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.33.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 35
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.05
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
	}
}

	id = orth.1
	title = orth.1.t
	desc = orth.1.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = orth.1.a

			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_CLE }
		}

				has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
			}
		}

	desc = rusd.36.d

				id = rusd.36
				days = 300
				random = 1440
			}
		}
	}

		name = rusd.36.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_elected_government = yes }

		}

		}
	}

country_event = { #Status of the Orthodox Church
	id = rusd.35
	title = rusd.35.t
	desc = rusd.35.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.35"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.72
				days = 30
				random = 2160
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.35.a
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = social_liberal
			}				
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_state_religion
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.36
				days = 40
				random = 2160
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = ties_with_church
				}
				remove_ideas = ties_with_church
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.35.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { 
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar
					has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
					has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_russian_monarch = yes
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.37
				days = 20
				random = 960
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.38
				days = 60
				random = 1440
			}
		}
	}
	
}

country_event = { #Motherland mass
	id = rusd.72
	title = rusd.72.t

	desc = {
		text = rusd.72.d.secular
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.72.d.orthodox
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.72"
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				75 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 365
							random = 2880
						}
					}
					else = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 365
							random = 1440
						}
					}
				}
				25 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 365
							random = 1440
						}
					}
					else = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 365
							random = 2880
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.72.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.72.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}
}

	id = rusd.74

		}
	}

			has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
		}
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusd.74.d.not_monarchy
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.74.d.monarchy
		trigger = {
			has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
		}
	}

			random_list = {
				75 = {

						limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 365
							random = 2880
						}
					}
					else = {

							id = rusd.72
							days = 365
							random = 1440
						}
					}
				}
				25 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 365
							random = 1440
						}
					}
					else = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 365
							random = 2880
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Kornilov's government
	id = rusd.53
	title = rusd.53.t
	desc = rusd.53.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		set_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				power_balance_value = {
					id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
					value > 0
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
			
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
		set_country_flag = RUS_DEN_TEMP
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				power_balance_value = {
					id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
					value < 0
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
		set_country_flag = RUS_DEN_TEMP
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = kornilov_stays_pm_tooltip
	}

country_event = { #Kornilov's Death
	id = rusd.54
	title = rusd.54.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.savinkov
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_kornilov_ruler
		}
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
			has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
			has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = junta_subtype
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.60
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.61
				days = 2
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}

		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_Manshteyn_sec_npo
		set_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.35
		}
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_savinkov_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_DEN_TEMP
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		remove_power_balance = { id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict }
		set_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade

			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }

				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"

country_event = { #Fate of Russia
	id = rusd.66
	title = rusd.66.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.66.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.66.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.67
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.69
			days = 2
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_country_flag = transamur_monarchy_restored }
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = TRM
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.68
				days = 2
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.68
				days = 2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VRA_TSAR
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_russian_junta_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		add_stability = -0.075
		RUS_setup_tsar_wrangel = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli
				RUS_Nikanor_V_Savic_eco_pau
				RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				desc = "POLITICS_PYOTR_VRANGEL_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pyotr_Wrangel_Tsar.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = pataut_bonapartism_subtype
				traits = { RUS_black_baron }
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.4
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
}

	id = rusd.67
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.9
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusd.67.t
	desc = rusd.67.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.67.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
				}
			}
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Nikolay_S_Trubetskoy_hog_sco

			set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
			set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored

				id = rusd.153
				days = 2
			}

			#	days = 60
			#}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.67.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}

						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS

					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Vasiliy_V_Shulgin_hog_sco
		hidden_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
			set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
			set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.153
				days = 2
			}
			#country_event = {
			#	id = rusdem.59
			#	days = 60
			#}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.67.c
		add_stability = -0.05
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
			set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored

	id = rusd.68
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation
	title = rusd.154.t
	desc = rusd.68.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.154.a
		set_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
			}
			RUS_setup_tsar_kirill = yes
			}
			if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI
			}
			RUS_setup_tsar_dmitriy = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 2
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Pogroms
	id = rusd.142
	title = rusd.142.t
	desc = rusd.142.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_POGROMS
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.142
				days = 60
				random = 600
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.142.a
		random_list = {
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
						add_manpower = -401
					}
					add_stability = -0.03
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -21
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -57
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -14
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
						add_manpower = -1000
					}
					add_stability = -0.05
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
						add_manpower = -327
					}
					add_stability = -0.03
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
						add_manpower = -713
					}
					add_stability = -0.04
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -608
					}
					add_stability = -0.04
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -84
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -257
					}
					add_stability = -0.01
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}

					name = "Sukhumabhinanda"
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes

				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Chula Chakrabongse"
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {

		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SIA
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		SIA = {

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Denikin-Wrangel Conflict
	id = rusd.209
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.209" }
	title = rusd.209.t
	desc = rusd.209.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_denikin
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		set_power_balance = {
			id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
			left_side = RUS_denikin_side 
			right_side = RUS_wrangel_side
			set_value = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RCW_used_savinkovs_help
					event_target:soviet_russia = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.205
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.56
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_wrangel
		set_power_balance = {
			id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
			left_side = RUS_denikin_side 
			right_side = RUS_wrangel_side
			set_value = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RCW_used_savinkovs_help
					event_target:soviet_russia = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.205
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.56
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_savinkov
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.56
			days = 2
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Talk to royal
	id = rusd.210
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.210" }
	title = rusd.210.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.210.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.210.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.210.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value < -0.4
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					90 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value > 0.4
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					90 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value < -0.5
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value > 0.5
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					40 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					60 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.211.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.211.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		name = rusd.211.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30

			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin

			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
		else = {
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.211.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
		RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase

		}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.220.a
		remove_backward_industry = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Boris Romanov dies
	id = rusd.94
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Boris II"
		}
	}
	title = rusd.94.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.94.d.has_heir
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.94.d.no_heir
		trigger = {
			NOT = {	has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession }
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.95"
		set_country_flag = Boris_Romanov_dead
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.94.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.94.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Kirill Romanov dies
	id = rusd.95

	title = {
		text = rusd.95.t.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.95.t.other
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = no
		}
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusd.95.d.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.95.d.other
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_in_power = no
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.95"
		set_country_flag = Kirill_Romanov_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = {
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Magnus I"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				ENG = {
					country_event = basedbrit.62
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.a
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
		
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
				}
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
					RUS_tsar_kirill = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Denikin's Death
	id = rusd.96
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.96" }
	title = rusd.96.t
	desc = rusd.96.d.hos

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.96.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_denikin_in_power = no
			NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade }
		}
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_id = 401
			}
			retire = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.96.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_denikin_in_power = yes
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_id = 401
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
				add_idea = RUS_Abram_Dragomirov_hog_ade
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_denikin_in_power = yes
			}
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Ivan Romanovskiy"
				desc = "POLITICS_IVAN_ROMANOVSKIY_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Ivan_Romanovsky.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = authdem_junta_subtype
			}
		}		
	}
}

	id = rusd.103

			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
	}

		text = rusd.103.t.not_tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
		}
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusd.103.d.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.103.d.not_tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.103"
		set_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_eco_ade
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_eco_ade
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
		}
	}

			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		RUS_setup_tsar_pavel = yes

	}

			RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.103.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
			RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = no
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.110
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.110" }
	title = rusd.110.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d.chairman
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			tag = SOV
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d.president
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			tag = RUS
		}
	}
	

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.110.a
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			add_ideas = SOV_Andrey_Zhdanov_sec_rso
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			add_ideas = SOV_Andrey_Zhdanov_hog_rso  
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				}
				tag = RUS
				NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				kill_country_leader = yes
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				}
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
			}
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Andrei Zhdanov"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Andrei_Zhdanov.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype
			}
		}				
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.114
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.114" }
	title = rusd.114.t
	desc = rusd.114.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.97.a
		add_stability = -0.01
		set_country_flag = RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sli
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sli
				add_idea = RUS_Andrey_D_Sakharov_eco_sli
			}
		}
	}
}


country_event = {
	id = rusd.116
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.116" }
	title = rusd.116.t
	desc = rusd.116.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	trigger = {
		has_unit_leader = 451
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.97.a
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 451 }
			retire = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #1st Women's Division of Death
	id = rusd.128
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.128" }
	title = rusd.128.t
	desc = rusd.128.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		controls_state = 219
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.128.a #Allow it
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_WOMAN_DIVISION_tt
		hidden_effect = { load_oob = RUS_WOMAN_DIVISION }
		create_corps_commander = {
			name = "Maria Bochkareva"
			portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Maria_Bochkareva.png"
			traits = {
				
			}
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 1
			defense_skill = 3
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.128.b #no
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
	}
}
