country_event = { #Wrangel dead
	id = rusd.130
	title = rusd.130.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.130.d.wrangeltsar
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
		}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.130.d.wrangelpm
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.130.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		RUS_setup_tsar_wrangel_son = yes
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_Vrangel_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_ade
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 400 }
			retire = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.130.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_Vrangel_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_ade
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 400 }
			retire = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.97.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_Vrangel_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_ade
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 400 }
			retire = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.130.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		RUS_setup_shatilov = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Pavel_N_Shatilov_hog_npo
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Viktor_L_Pokrovskiy_sec_npo 
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 400 }
			retire = yes
		}
	}
}

		trigger = {

				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Nikolay Avksentiev"
				}
			}
		}
	}

		tag = RUS

			}
		}

		RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes

	}

					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Nikolay Avksentiev"
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_Avksentiev_dead
	}
}
country_event = { #Nekrasov dead
	id = rusd.132
	title = rusd.132.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.132.d.pm
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_hog_sli
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.132.d.president
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Nikolay Nekrasov"
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.132.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						ruling_only = yes
						name = "Nikolay Nekrasov"
					}
					has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_hog_sli
				}
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.132.a
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Nikolay Nekrasov"
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_hog_sli
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_hog_sli
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_for_sli
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_for_sli
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_I_Tereshchenko_for_sli
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Nabokov dead
	id = rusd.133
	title = rusd.133.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.133.d.pm
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_hog_mli
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.133.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_hog_mli
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = { has_country_flag = Vladimir_D_Nabokov_dead }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.133.a
		set_country_flag = Vladimir_D_Nabokov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_hog_mli
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_hog_mli
			add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_I_Konovalov_hog_mli
			
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_for_mli
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_D_Nabokov_for_mli
			add_ideas = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_marlibs_progressives
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			name = RUS_progressive_party
			long_name = RUS_progressive_party_long
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Choosing Tsar - CM
	id = rusd.153
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.8
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
			RUS_setup_monarch_variables = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.581
				days = 14
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.585
				months = 37
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.587
				months = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.588
				months = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.584
				months = 7
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.204
				days = 60
				random_days = 344
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.589
				months = 14
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.205
				months = 4
			}
			
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = DKB
						tag = KUB
						tag = KLY
						tag = MON
						tag = TRM
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.590
					days = 14
					random_days = 15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusd.153.t 
	desc = rusd.153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.153.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}			
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Choosing Tsar - AM
	id = rusd.154
	title = rusd.154.t 
	desc = rusd.154.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.165.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA }
		}
		RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		clr_country_flag = RUS_democracy
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_dmitriy = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 1
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.8
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.165.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		clr_country_flag = RUS_democracy
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_anastasia = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1956
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 1
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.8
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

	option = {
		name = russia.1956.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes

			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}

				id = rusdem.572
				days = 16
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}			
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Choosing PM - Absolutism
	id = rusd.1541
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { remove_all_ministers = yes }
	}
	title = rusd.1541.t
	desc = rusd.1541.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.1541.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_hog_pau
		set_country_flag = RUS_PUR
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_chern
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_sec_pau 
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.1541.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
		clr_country_flag = RUS_PUR
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
				RUS_Nikolay_A_Maklakov_eco_pau
				RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_sec_ade
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.1541.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		add_ideas = RUS_Vasiliy_V_Shulgin_hog_sco
		clr_country_flag = RUS_PUR

				has_country_flag = RUS_VRA

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		name = rusd.35.c
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_ideas = RUS_state_religion		
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Patriarch_Sergius_hog_pau

		clr_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		clr_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		set_country_flag = RUS_CLE
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = ties_with_church
				}
				remove_ideas = ties_with_church
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
	}

	}

### Economy events
country_event = { #Size of funds discussion
	id = rusd.172
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.172" }
	title = rusd.172.t
	desc = rusd.172.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.172.a
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.172.b
		trigger = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 0
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.172.c
		trigger = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 1
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
}

	id = rusd.173
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.173" }
	title = rusd.173.t
	desc = rusd.173.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #civil services
		name = rusd.173.a
		RUS_set_zemstvo_result_social = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_zemstva_social_focus
	}
	option = { #industry
		name = rusd.173.b
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Local_Development
		}
		RUS_set_zemstvo_result_industry = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUs_zemstva_civilian_focus
	}
	option = { #research
		name = rusd.173.c
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Zemstvo_Research_Initiatives
		}
		RUS_set_zemstvo_result_research = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUs_zemstva_research_focus
	}
}

			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital

		}
	}

		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.174.t.industrial_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.industrial_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure

	title = {

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research

	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.174.t.military_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.military_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}

	### Effects

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_pick_zemstvo_states = yes }
	}

	#SOCIAL
	option = { #new hospitals
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 0.001 }
		add_stability = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #new schools
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 25 }
		add_political_power = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #housing programme
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 0.001 }
		add_war_support = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #failed civil investments
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -0.001 }
			add_stability = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -0.001 }
			add_war_support = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 25 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -1 }
			add_political_power = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	#INDUSTRY
	option = { #industrial expansion
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_civilian_industry
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #production increase
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_industry
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #infrastructure expansion
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_infrastructure
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #agricultural development
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_agriculture
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #refinery built
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_synthetics
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = synthetic_refinery
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #failed industrial investment
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_civilian_industry
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_industry
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_infrastructure
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_agriculture
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_synthetics
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 120
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 60
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	#RESEARCH 

	option = { #industrial research advance
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.6
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.4
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.2
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #industrial research breakthrough
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #industrial research setback
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #military research advance
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.6
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.4
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.2
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

		name = rusd.174.a

		}

country_event = { #Anniversary
	id = rusd.180
	picture = GFX_rus_day_after
	title = rusd.180.t
	desc = rusd.180.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS = {
			has_democratic_government = yes
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.180.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.180
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusd.181
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.3" }
	title = rusd.181.t
	desc = rusd.181.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_rakhmaninov
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		soviets_exist = no
		american_civil_war = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.181.a
		add_political_power = 15
	}
}
###Socialist events
country_event = { #Unlock political decisions
	id = russoc.1
	picture = GFX_rus_commie_event
	title = russoc.1.t
	desc = {
		text = russoc.1.d.popular
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Aleksandr Yegorov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.1.d.yegorov
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksandr Yegorov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {#Popular Front decision
		name = russoc.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TRADEUNIONISTS
					}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_congress_tt
		set_country_flag = unlock_congress_sov
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_K_Volsky_hog_rso }
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					name = RUS_radical_socialist_party
					long_name = RUS_radical_socialist_party_long
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {#Yegorov rules alone
		name = russoc.1.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksandr Yegorov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			has_unit_leader = 1955
			has_unit_leader = 1954
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.50
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = national_populist
				popularity = 0
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {#Yegorov invites bolsheviks
		name = russoc.1.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksandr Yegorov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_banned_bolsheviks }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
					}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000

					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MAYAKOVSKY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_GASTEV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_LUNACHARSKY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZINOVIEV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_KAMENEV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_SOKOLNIKOV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_CHICHERIN
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MOLOTOV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_YAGODA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_KAGANOVICH
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_YEZHOV
				}
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			name = SOV_totalist_party
			long_name = SOV_totalist_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			name = RUS_radical_socialist_party
			long_name = RUS_radical_socialist_party_long
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Grigory Zinoviev"
			desc = "POLITICS_GRIGORY_ZINOVIEV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Grigoriy_Zinoviev.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = authcom_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_hog_tot
			SOV_Lev_Kamenev_for_tot
			RUS_Evgeniy_A_Preobrazhenskiy_eco_tot
			SOV_Georgy_Blagonravov_sec_tot
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Bolsheviks_In_Power
		set_country_flag = zhukov_invites_bolsheviks
		hidden_effect = {
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = national_populist
				popularity = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Socialist congress
	id = russoc.2
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_K_Volsky_hog_rso }
			}
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
		}
		set_country_flag = rkp_banned 
		setup_soviet_congress = yes
	}			
	title = russoc.2.t
	desc = russoc.2.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.2.a
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_banned_bolsheviks } }
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.3
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.4
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Question of Bolsheviks
	id = russoc.3
	title = russoc.3.t
	desc = russoc.3.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.3.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = congress_bolsheviks_allowed
		increase_bolsheviks_congress = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Lev Kamenev"
			desc = "POLITICS_LEV_KAMENEV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Lev_Kamenev.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = authcom_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		add_stability = -0.07
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.4
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.6
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.3.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		set_country_flag = rkp_banned 
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_democrat } }
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.4
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.6
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

			modifier = {

			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP
					}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		increase_nsp_congress = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.10
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.5.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		increase_mensheviks_congress = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.10
			days = 5
		}
	}

				days = 990
			}
		}
	}
	title = russoc.12.t
	desc = russoc.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russoc.12.a

			NOT = { has_country_flag = rkp_banned }

				id = russoc.153
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.154
				days = 180
				random_days = 60
			}

country_event = {#Trade Unions
	id = russoc.21
	title = russoc.21.t
	desc = russoc.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.21.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = state_controlled_tu
				has_country_flag = zhukov_invites_bolsheviks
				has_country_flag = zhukov_rules_alone
			}
		}
		add_ideas = trade_unions_1
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.21.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = tu_control_state
		}
		add_ideas = trade_unions_2
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.21.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = completely_ind_tu
		}
		add_ideas = trade_unions_3
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.21.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = tu_with_limited_state_control
		}
		add_ideas = trade_unions_4
	}
}

	desc = russoc.23.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.23.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				has_state_category = two 
				has_state_category = three
				has_state_category = four
				has_state_category = five
			}
			add_state_modifier = {
				modifier = {
					local_resources = 0.15
					local_supplies = 0.15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.23.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}	
}
country_event = { #Famine
	id = russoc.24
	title = russoc.24.t
	desc = russoc.24.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.24.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = RUS.RUS_starting_states_array
			add_state_modifier = {
				modifier = {
					local_manpower = 0.3
					local_resources = 0.15
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT } }
			add_state_modifier = {
				modifier = {
					compliance_growth = 0.5
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_The_New_Oprichnina_tooltip
		multiply_variable = { rus_core_integration_cost_compliance = 0.8 }
		multiply_variable = { rus_core_integration_time_to_remove = 0.8 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Alliance_With_Left_SRs
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_Eurasian_Bolsheviks_1
				add_idea = RUS_Eurasian_Bolsheviks_2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.23.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_political_power = 100
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
	}	
}
country_event = { #Profintern
	id = russoc.25
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_political_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_socdem_bonus = 0.02 }
		}
	}
	title = russoc.25.t
	desc = russoc.25.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.25.a
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = SOV_profintern_leader_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { add_ideas = SOV_profintern_leader }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_political_power = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_factories = 1 }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENT }
				NOT = { tag = AUS }
				NOT = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = AUS }
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.26
				days = 3
				random_days = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russoc.26

				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = {

				id = russoc.27
				days = 3
				random_days = 12
			}
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_political_power = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_given_factories = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_profintern_socdem_bonus = 0.02 }
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = SOV_profintern_member_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { add_ideas = SOV_profintern_member }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_political_power = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_given_factories = 1 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.28
				days = 3
				random_days = 12
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Chekist
	id = russoc.37
	title = russoc.37.t
	desc = russoc.37.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.37.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Iosif_M_Ostrovsky_eco_syn
		SOV_increase_chekist = yes
		SOV_decrease_legalist = yes
		set_temp_variable = { syn_pop = party_popularity@syndicalist }
		multiply_temp_variable = { syn_pop = 100 }
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = syn_pop
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.25
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Yakov Fishman"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_SOV_Yakov_Fishman.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = socialist_security_state_subtype
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			name = RUS_syndicalist_party
			long_name = RUS_syndicalist_party_long
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.37.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
			RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
			RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
			RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn
		}
		SOV_decrease_chekist = yes
		hidden_effect = { SOV_decrease_chekist = yes }
		SOV_increase_legalist = yes		
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Vladimir Trutovsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_SOV_Vladimir_Trutovsky.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
		}
		unlock_national_focus = SOV_Left_SR_Countercoup
	}	
}

country_event = { #Soviet elections
	id = russoc.39
	title = russoc.39.t
	desc = russoc.39.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		NOT = { has_government = totalist }
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rkp_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_government = syndicalist
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_completed_focus = SOV_Premier_Volsky
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_completed_focus = SOV_Introduce_NEP
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_nsp_union_with_rsdrp }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
}

				days = 990

				id = russoc.41
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	title = russoc.40.t
	desc = russoc.40.d

country_event = {#Results
	id = russoc.41
	title = russoc.41.t
	desc = russoc.41.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.41.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_rkp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_nsp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_psr_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_rsdrp_percentage_vote } 
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Left_SR_Countercoup }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = SOV_union_formed 
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_labor_republic
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Maria Spiridonova"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Maria Spiridonova"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Maria_Spiridonova.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = syndicalist
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 36
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
				RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
				RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
				RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.41.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_rkp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_nsp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_psr_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_rsdrp_percentage_vote } 
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Isaak Shteinberg"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Isaak Shteinberg"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Isaak_Steinberg.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = syndicalist
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 36
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
				RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
				RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
				RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn
			}
		}			
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = SOV_union_formed 
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_labor_republic
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.41.c
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_rkp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_nsp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_plsr_percentage_vote > SOV_psr_percentage_vote }

		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = SOV_union_formed 
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_psr
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.41.p
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_rkp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_plsr_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_rsdrp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_nsp_percentage_vote }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Lev Gershtein"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Lev Gershtein"
				desc = "POLITICS_GERSHTEIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Lev_Gershtein.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = narodism_subtype
				traits = { }
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = radical_socialist
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 36
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
				name = RUS_social_liberal_party
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_K_Volsky_hog_rso
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Ivan_N_Smirnov_for_rso
				RUS_Nikolay_I_Ivanov_eco_rso
				RUS_Kost_S_Burevoy_sec_rso
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = SOV_union_formed 
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_psr
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.41.q
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_rkp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_plsr_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_rsdrp_percentage_vote } 
			check_variable = { SOV_psr_percentage_vote > SOV_nsp_percentage_vote }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {

						name = "Mikhail Likhach"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}

				name = "Mikhail Likhach"

country_event = { #Rykov
	id = russoc.42
	title = russoc.42.t
	desc = {
		text = russoc.42.d.nep
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.42.d.no_nep
		trigger = { has_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep }
	}	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.42.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		every_owned_state = {
			add_state_modifier = {
				modifier = {
					local_building_slots = 1
					local_factory_sabotage = -0.3
					local_supplies = 0.5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.43
	title = russoc.43.t
	desc = russoc.43.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.43.a
		add_stability = -0.25
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				65 = {
					modifier = {
						add = 35
						202 = { NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT } }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.44
						days = 15
					}
				}
				35 = {
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				45 = {
					modifier = {
						add = 35
						11 = { NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT } }
					}
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							set_country_flag = latvia_will_revolt
						}
						80 = {
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						40 = {
							set_country_flag = lithuania_will_revolt
						}
						60 = {
						}
					}					
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.45
						days = 20
						random_days = 20
					}
				}
				55 = {
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.46
						days = 25
					}
				}
				50 = {
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				80 = {
					random_list = {
						80 = {
							set_country_flag = armenia_will_revolt
						}
						20 = {
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						40 = {
							set_country_flag = mtr_will_revolt
						}
						60 = {
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						30 = {
							set_country_flag = azeri_will_revolt
						}
						70 = {
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.47
						days = 30
					}
				}
				20 = {
				}
			}
		}				
	}
}
country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.44
	title = russoc.44.t
	desc = russoc.44.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.44.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				state = 792
				state = 201
				state = 199
				state = 1228
				state = 198
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = PREV }
			add_core_of = UKR
			transfer_state_to = UKR
		}
		UKR = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Oleksander Shumsky"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_Ukraine_Oleksander_Shumsky.png" 
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = national_communism_subtype
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.44.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = no
				OR = {
					is_core_of = UKR
					is_core_of = WSU
					is_core_of = GAL
					is_east_galicia = yes
				}
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_core_of = UKR
			transfer_state_to = UKR
		}
		UKR = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Oleksander Shumsky"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_Ukraine_Oleksander_Shumsky.png" 
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = national_communism_subtype
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.48
				days = 2
			}
		}		
	}	
}
country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.45
	title = russoc.45.t
	desc = russoc.45.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.45.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = lithuania_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					state = 11
					state = 96
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = LIT
				transfer_state_to = LIT
			}
			LIT = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Augustinas Voldemaras"
					desc = "POLITICS_VOLDEMARAS_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/LIT/Portrait_LIT_Augustinas_Voldemaras_KX.png"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = national_populist_subtype
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = national_populist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = LIT
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = latvia_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					state = 1091
					state = 190
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = LAT
				transfer_state_to = LIT
			}
			LAT = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = national_populist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = LAT
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}		
	}		
}

country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.47
	title = russoc.47.t
	desc = russoc.47.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.47.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_core_of = GEO
			transfer_state_to = GEO
		}
		GEO = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}			
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = GEO
			type = annex_everything
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = armenia_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ARM
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = ARM
				transfer_state_to = ARM
			}
			ARM = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = totalist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = totalist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = ARM
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mtr_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = MTR
					NOT = { is_core_of = AZE }
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = MTR
				transfer_state_to = MTR
			}
			MTR = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = MTR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = azeri_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = AZE
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = AZE
				AZE = { transfer_state = PREV }
				transfer_state_to = AZE
			}
			AZE = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = AZE
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.47.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_core_of = GEO
			transfer_state_to = GEO
		}
		GEO = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}			
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.48
				days = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = armenia_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ARM
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = ARM
				transfer_state_to = ARM
			}
			ARM = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = totalist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = totalist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.48
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mtr_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = MTR
					NOT = { is_core_of = AZE }
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = MTR
				transfer_state_to = MTR
			}
			MTR = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = MTR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = azeri_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = AZE
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = AZE
				transfer_state_to = AZE
			}
			AZE = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = AZE
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { #Troika
	id = russoc.48
	title = russoc.48.t
	desc = russoc.48.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.48.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.2
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.48.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = yes
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		get_current_government_type = yes
		FROM = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomous_state = kr_nominal_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
		}
		restore_previous_government_type = yes				
	}
}

country_event = { #Troika
	id = russoc.50
	title = russoc.50.t
	desc = russoc.50.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.50.a
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Georgy Zhukov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Gregory_Zhukov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_red_junta_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
		set_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 30
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Tukha_Influence
			value = 40
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Frunze_Influence
			value = 35
		}
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = SOV_Troika
		activate_mission = SOV_power_struggle_ends
		activate_mission = SOV_get_bolsheviks_on_our_side
		activate_mission = SOV_get_plsr_on_our_side
		activate_mission = SOV_get_voroshilov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.108
				days = 180
				random_days = 40
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.109
				days = 250
				random_days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.110
				days = 150
				random_days = 20
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.111
				days = 300
				random_days = 30
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Zinoviev
	id = russoc.54
	title = russoc.54.t
	desc = russoc.54.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.54.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_zhukov
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_zinoviev_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					0 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.55
							days = 2
						}
					}
					80 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.56
							days = 2
						}
					}
					20 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.57
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_tukha
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_zinoviev_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					80 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.55

					}
				}
			}

country_event = { #voroshilov plot
	id = russoc.63
	title = russoc.63.t
	desc = russoc.63.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.63.a
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Georgiy_K_Zhukov_hog_tot
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_K_Zhukov_hog_tot
		}
		set_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 457 }
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					Tukha_Influence > Frunze_Influence
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Mikhail Tukhachevsky"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = red_junta_subtype
				traits = { red_napoleon }
			}
		}
		else = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Mikhail Frunze"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Frunze.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = red_junta_subtype
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #voroshilov plot
	id = russoc.64
	title = russoc.64.t
	desc = russoc.64.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.63.a
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 453 }
			retire = yes
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Frunze_Influence
			value = 0
		}
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead
	}
}

country_event = { #voroshilov plot
	id = russoc.67
	title = russoc.66.t
	desc = russoc.67.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.67.a
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 605 }
			retire = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = voroshilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = voroshilov_supported_frunze
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = Frunze_Influence
				value = 25
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = voroshilov_supported_zhukov
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = Zhukov_Influence
				value = 25
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #plsr support
	id = russoc.68
	title = russoc.68.t
	desc = russoc.68.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.68.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		set_country_flag = completely_ind_tu
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_zhukov
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}					
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_frunze
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.71
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_frunze
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_zhukov
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.69
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_tukha
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.70
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_tukha
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.70
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.68.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		set_country_flag = completely_ind_tu
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_zhukov
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}					
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_frunze
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.71
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_frunze
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_zhukov
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.69
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_tukha
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.70
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_zhukov
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.69
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_tukha
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.71
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.68.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		set_country_flag = tu_with_limited_state_control
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_zhukov
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}					
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_frunze
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.71
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_frunze
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}

			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.69
					days = 5
				}

						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
					}
				}
			}

			hidden_effect = {

					days = 5

country_event = { #plsr support
	id = russoc.69
	title = russoc.69.t
	desc = russoc.69.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.69.a
		set_country_flag = plsr_support_zhukov
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = tu_with_limited_state_control
			}
			add_ideas = trade_unions_4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = state_controlled_tu
			}
			add_ideas = trade_unions_1
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = trade_unions_3
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 25
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Troika dissolves
	id = russoc.85
	immediate = { set_country_flag = SOV_Troika_dissolved }
	title = russoc.85.t
	desc = russoc.85.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.85.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = {
					var = Zhukov_Influence
					value = Tukha_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = Zhukov_Influence
					value = Frunze_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
			}
		}			
		set_country_flag = zhukov_rules_alone
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			long_name = RUS_red_army_party_long
			name = RUS_red_army_party
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Georgy Zhukov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Gregory_Zhukov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = red_junta_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.85.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = {
					var = Tukha_Influence
					value = Zhukov_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = Tukha_Influence
					value = Frunze_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead }
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Tukhachevsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = red_junta_subtype
			traits = { red_napoleon }
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			SOV_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_hog_tot
			SOV_Iona_Yakir_for_tot
			SOV_Ieronim_Uborevich_eco_tot
			SOV_Vitaliy_Primakov_sec_tot
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tukhachevsky
		set_country_flag = tukhachevsky_power
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			long_name = SOV_tukh_party_long
			name = SOV_tukh_party
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_hog_tot
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
		hidden_effect = {
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 52
				syndicalist = 16
				radical_socialist = 19
				social_democrat = 13
				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
			}
		} 
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.85.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = {
					var = Frunze_Influence
					value = Tukha_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = Frunze_Influence
					value = Zhukov_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
			}
		}			
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Frunze"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Frunze.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = red_junta_subtype
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tukhachevsky
		set_country_flag = tukhachevsky_power
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			long_name = SOV_frunze_party_long
			name = SOV_frunze_party
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			SOV_Mikhail_V_Frunze_hog_tot
			SOV_Robert_P_Eydeman_for_tot
			SOV_Avgust_I_Kork_eco_tot
			SOV_Vladimir_Antonov_Ovseyenko_sec_tot
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_frunze
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_hog_tot
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
		hidden_effect = {
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 52
				syndicalist = 16
				radical_socialist = 19
				social_democrat = 13
				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.159
				days = 180
				random_days = 600
			}
		} 
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #FROM refuses
	id = russoc.101
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.101" }
	title = russoc.101.t
	desc = russoc.101.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.101.a
		add_political_power = -25
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Socialist Victory in the Civil War (GER)
	id = russoc.103
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.103 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russoc.103.t
	desc = russoc.103.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	fire_only_once = yes
	#trigger = {
	#	tag = GER
	#	soviets_exist = yes
	#	SOV = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_restored_in_transamur } }
	#}
	#mean_time_to_happen = {
	#	days = 5
	#}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russoc.103.a #Offer protection to all threatened nations
		ai_chance = { base = 85 }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = POL
					tag = FIN
					tag = DKB
					tag = KUB
					tag = GEO
				}
				at_peace_or_same_enemies_as_ROOT = yes
				is_subject = no
				is_in_faction = no
				has_socialist_government = no
				NOT = {
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.119
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.103.b #We don't fear the Russians
		ai_chance = { base = 15 }
		add_political_power = -50
	}
}

country_event = { # Formation of the Young Pioneers
	id = russoc.111
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.111" }
	title = russoc.111.t
	desc = russoc.111.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = SOV
		has_completed_focus = RUS_Bolsheviks_In_Power
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.111.a

country_event = { # An Invitation to the Internationale
	id = russoc.115
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.115" }
	title = russoc.115.t
	
	desc = {
		text = russoc.115.d.guaranteed
		trigger = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.115.d.invited
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.115.a #Yes, let's join forces
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			}
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else = {
			var:FROM.faction_leader = { country_event = russoc.116 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.115.b #We shouldn't provoke Germany...
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.117 }
	}
}
