country_event = { #German Protection? (POL/FIN/DKB/GEO/AZE/KUB/MTR/KLY)
	id = russoc.119
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.119 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russoc.119.t
	desc = russoc.119.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.119.a #Accept
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = GEO_end_treaty
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = DKB
				don_is_pro_german = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = KUB
				kuban_is_pro_german = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = FIN
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = KLY
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.120
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = DKB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = KLY
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = KUB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = MTR
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = MTR
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = AZE
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.119.b #Ask for a guarantee only
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				tag = MTR
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
		}
		GER = { give_guarantee = ROOT }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = DKB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = KLY
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = KUB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = MTR
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = MTR
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = AZE
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.119.c #Refuse
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				tag = POL
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Bukharin's death
	id = russoc.121
	title = russoc.121.t
	desc = russoc.121.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Nikolay Bukharin"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep }
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.121.a
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_I_Bukharin_dead
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Congress of Soviets"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Sovnarkom.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.122
				days = 60
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.123
				days = 90
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.124
				days = 120
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.125
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Elections of Chairman
	id = russoc.125
	title = russoc.125.t
	desc = russoc.125.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.125.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
		}
		set_country_flag = kosygin_victorous
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Kosygin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Kosygin.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.125.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 34
		}
		set_country_flag = ryutin_victorous
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Martemyan Ryutin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = bukharinist_subtype
			traits = { SOV_peasant_propagandist }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.125.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
		}
		set_country_flag = natsynd_victorous
		clr_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_on_with_nep
		set_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep
		uncomplete_national_focus = {
			focus = SOV_Go_On_With_NEP
			uncomplete_children = yes
			refund_political_power = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = rus_nep_17
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = rus_nep_17
					add_idea = rus_nep_14
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = rus_nep_16
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = rus_nep_16
					add_idea = rus_nep_14
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = rus_nep_15
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = rus_nep_15
					add_idea = rus_nep_14
				}
			}
		}			
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			name = SOV_natsynd_party
			long_name = SOV_natsynd_party_long
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Kuznetsov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Kuznetsov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = natsynd_subtype
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Flavour by Bukabuck
	id = russoc.144
	title = russoc.144.t
	desc = russoc.144.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.144.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists 
					has_country_flag = SOV_nsp_union_with_rsdrp 
				}
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_democrat
				elections_allowed = yes
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Sergey Kirov"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Sergey_Kirov_gigachad.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = socdem_democratic_socialism_subtype
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep }
				}
				set_country_leader_ideology = socdem_humanistic_capitalism_subtype
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Autonomy for Don/Kuban
	id = rusfor.101
	title = rusfor.101.t
	desc = rusfor.101.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.101.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.102
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.101.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.103
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Autonomy for Don/Kuban
	id = rusfor.102
	title = rusfor.102.t
	desc = rusfor.102.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.102.a
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					tag = DKB
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = DKB_Novorussia_RUS
				hidden_effect = {
					set_political_party = {
						ideology = authoritarian_democrat
						popularity = 60
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = KUB_RUS
				hidden_effect = {
					set_political_party = {
						ideology = social_conservative
						popularity = 60
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_conservative
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Battle for Astrakhan
	id = rusfor.104
	title = rusfor.104.t
	desc = rusfor.104.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_towar
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		owns_state = 236
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.104.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			KLY = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.105
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		start_border_war = {
			change_state_after_war = no
			attacker = {
				state = 236
				num_provinces = 4
				on_win = rusfor.106
				on_lose = rusfor.107
				on_cancel = rusfor.108
			}
				
			defender = {
				state = 1191
				num_provinces = 4
				on_win = rusfor.106
				on_lose = rusfor.107
				on_cancel = rusfor.108
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.104.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
}

	id = rusfor.106
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = RUS
				}
				RUS = {
					transfer_state = 1191
					add_state_claim = 1191
					add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = 1191 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusfor.106.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.106.d.rus
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.106.d.kly
		trigger = {
			tag = KLY
		}
	}	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.106.a
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		KLY = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1289
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.106.b
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_stability = 0.07
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.106.c
		trigger = {
			tag = KLY
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
	}
}

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.117.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_transamur }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_caucasus
			}
		}
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.142 }
	}
	option = { #
		name = rusfor.117.f
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_central_asia
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_caucasus
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_eastern_europe
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_transamur
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10000
		}
		country_event = rusfor.147
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.148 }
	}	
}
country_event = { #Kerensky Germany
	id = rusfor.118
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.118"}
	title = rusfor.118.t
	desc = rusfor.118.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.118.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = 0.15
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_Negotiations_Fail
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
				leave_faction = yes
			}
		}
		country_event = russia.55
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk }
		remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk_1
		}
		RUS_remove_riga_accords = yes
		add_named_threat = { 
			threat = 7
			name = "Russia Repudiated Minsk Treaty!"
		}		
	}	
}

country_event = { #Kerensky Germany
	id = rusfor.123
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.123"}
	title = rusfor.123.t
	desc = rusfor.123.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.123.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
		}
		add_war_support = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Join_The_Reichspakt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
				GER = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_central_asia
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.125
				hours = 2
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.117
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = rusfor.123.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_foreign_policy
					option = RUS_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.124
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.126
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.124
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.126
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}		
}

			base = 70
		}
		add_war_support = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Join_The_Reichspakt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
				GER = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_eastern_ukraine_war
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_eastern_europe
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.117
			days = 2
		}

country_event = { #Kerensky Germany
	id = rusfor.147
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.147"}
	title = rusfor.147.t
	desc = rusfor.147.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.147.a
		
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Try_To_Change_Terms
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = rus_brest_litovsk
			add_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_renegotiated
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		add_war_support = 0.1
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = RUS_brestlitovsk
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = GER
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}	
}

		add_war_support = 0.1
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = RUS
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
		}
	}		
}





### FOREIGN POLICY ###
country_event = { #Germany's Reaction on Russian plans in Caucasus
	id = rusfor.1000
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1000" }
	title = rusfor.1000.t
	desc = rusfor.1000.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_towar
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus } }
		

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.a #Demand that Russia respects the Brest-Litovsk treaty!
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_EMBARGO
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_NOT_CARE
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1005
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.b #Threaten Russia and invite the endangered nations into the Völkerbund!
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				DKB = { has_socialist_government = no }
				country_exists = KUB
				is_in_faction_with = GEO
			}
			OR = {
				is_neighbor_of = DKB
				any_allied_country = {
					is_neighbor_of = DKB
				}
				is_neighbor_of = KUB
				any_allied_country = {
					is_neighbor_of = KUB
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_NOT_CARE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_EMBARGO
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		every_country = { #GEO & AZR
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = DKB
					tag = KUB
					tag = GEO
				}
				has_socialist_government = no
				has_war = no
				is_subject = no
				is_in_faction = no
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1001
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = GEO
			}
			every_country = { #GEO & AZR
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = MTR
						tag = AZE
					}
					has_socialist_government = no
					has_war = no
					is_subject = no
					is_in_faction = no
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1001
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1005
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.c #We don't care about the Caucasus.
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_EMBARGO
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				don_is_pro_german = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				kuban_is_pro_german = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				GEO = { has_country_flag = GEO_end_treaty }
			}
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				leave_faction = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_global_flag = AXIS_VICTORY }
					TUR = { is_subject = no }
				}
				TUR = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ottfor.51 
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #alliance name
	id = rusfor.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1" }
	title = rusfor.1.t
	desc = rusfor.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.a
		trigger = {
			has_democratic_government = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = russian_cis
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = russian_cis
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = eurasian_bloc
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = eurasian_bloc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = moscow_accord
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = moscow_accord
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = fourth_internationale
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = fourth_internationale
		}
	}
}
	
	
country_event = { #Security of the Eastern border OTT
	id = rusfor.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.2" }
	title = rusfor.2.t
	desc = rusfor.2.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = TUR
		is_subject = no
		has_war = no
		RUS = { is_subject = no }
		OR = {
			231 = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = RUS
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = rus_negotiations
		}	
		country_exists = EGY
		NOT = {
			is_in_faction_with = EGY
			has_subject = EGY
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.2.a #Send the Prince!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.3
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.2.b #No deals with the Russians!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = 20
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia wants armenia
	id = rusfor.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.5" }
	title = rusfor.5.t
	desc = rusfor.5.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.5.a #abandon armenia
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		ARM = {
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_ideas = arm_ottoman_occupation
			hidden_effect = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					popularity = 0
				}
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = ARM
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		add_political_power = -10
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.6
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.5.b #we won't give up on armenia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #The Crimea
	id = rusfor.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.7" }
	title = rusfor.7.t
	desc = rusfor.7.d

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_subject = no
		date > 1938.01.01
		UKR = {
			owns_state = 137
			controls_state = 137
			OR = {
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.7.a #Try to lease the Crimea.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		add_state_claim = 137
		add_state_claim = 1220
		add_state_claim = 1221
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.8
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.7.b #Leave the Crimea for the Ukraine.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia asks to lease the Crimea
	id = rusfor.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.8" }
	title = rusfor.8.t
	desc = rusfor.8.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.8.a #Give the Crimea to the Russians.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = { transfer_state = 137 }
			effect_tooltip = { transfer_state = 1220 }
			effect_tooltip = { transfer_state = 1221 }
			send_equipment = {
				target = ROOT
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = 2000
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.9
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.8.b #No, the Crimea is Ukrainian now!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		trigger = {
			is_subject = no
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.10
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.10" }
	title = rusfor.10.t
	desc = rusfor.10.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10.a #Renounce the claim.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		remove_state_claim = 137
		remove_state_claim = 1220
		remove_state_claim = 1221
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10.b #They had better control the Black Sea well for us.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10.c #Ungrateful Ukrainians! This means war!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		FROM = { leave_faction = yes }
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = 130 #Western Ukraine
					region = 165 #Eastern Ukraine
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = no
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			ROOT = { add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = PREV } }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Panslavic Congress - Invitations
	id = rusfor.11
	title = rusfor.11.t
	desc = rusfor.11.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				is_subject_of = RUS
			}			
		}
		set_country_flag = psc_council_vote
		add_to_array = { global.PSC_voters = ROOT }
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.12
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.13
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Panslavic Congress - Czechoslovakia
	id = rusfor.18
	title = rusfor.18.t
	desc = rusfor.18.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.18.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.27
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.18.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.27
			days = 15
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PS - Czechoslovakia Result
	id = rusfor.27
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.27" }
	title = rusfor.27.t
	desc = rusfor.27.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
			set_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
			set_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
		clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
		set_country_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_denied
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.27.a

		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes

			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_illyria_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_independent
			set_country_flag = illyria_independent_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_illyria_separate_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_separate_independent
			set_country_flag = illyria_separate_approved
		}

			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_illyria_slovenia_croatia
			}

			set_country_flag = illyria_slovenia_croatia_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {

			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}

				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!

						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}

			}
		}
		trigger = {

			}
		}
	}

			}

		}

					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}

		trigger = {

				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_serbia
		clr_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_croatia

			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			CRO = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			SER = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.21.a
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_yugoslavia
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.30
			days = 15
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PS - Yugoslavia Result
	id = rusfor.30
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.30" }
	title = rusfor.30.t
	desc = rusfor.30.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_yugoslavia
		set_country_flag = yugoslavia_approved
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_yugoslavia
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Panslavic Congress - Galicia
	id = rusfor.22
	title = rusfor.22.t
	desc = rusfor.22.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		AND = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			OR = {
				UKR = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
				GAL = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
				POL = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
				AUS = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.a
		trigger = {
			country_exists = POL
			country_exists = UKR
			UKR = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			POL = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}		
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.b
		trigger = {
			country_exists = POL
			NOT = { country_exists = UKR }
			POL = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}		
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {country_exists = POL }
			10 = {
				owner = {
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			NOT = { country_exists = UKR }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { country_exists = UKR }
			
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.f
		trigger = {
			country_exists = POL
			POL = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
			}
			country_exists = UKR
			UKR = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PS - Galicia Result
	id = rusfor.31
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.31" }
	title = rusfor.31.t
	desc = rusfor.31.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
			set_country_flag = galicia_split_ukraine_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
			set_country_flag = galicia_split_russia_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
			set_country_flag = galicia_annex_russia_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
			set_country_flag = eastgalicia_split_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
			set_country_flag = eastgalicia_ukraine_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
		clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
		clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
		clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
		clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PS - Carpathian Rus Result
	id = rusfor.33
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.33" }
	title = rusfor.33.t
	desc = rusfor.33.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_cze
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_cze
			set_country_flag = zakarpatie_cze_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_slo
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_slo
			set_country_flag = zakarpatie_slo_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_ukr
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_ukr
			set_country_flag = zakarpatie_ukr_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_rus
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_rus
			set_country_flag = zakarpatie_rus_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!

		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes

		clr_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_slo
		clr_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_ukr
		clr_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_rus
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Status of Czechoslovakia
	id = rusfor.1304
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1304" }
	title = rusfor.1304.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1304.d.czechoslovakia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1304.d.slovakia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1309
				days = 3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { country_exists = SVK }
					HUN = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HUN = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1306
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { country_exists = SVK }
					HUN = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HUN = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1306
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1312
				days = 1
			}
			set_country_flag = austria_refuse_to_release_czechs
		}
		
	}
}
country_event = { #Free Czechoslovakia
	id = rusfor.1305
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1305" }
	title = rusfor.1305.t
	desc = rusfor.1305.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			HUN = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_leader = {
								name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
						}
					}
					effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
				}
			set_cosmetic_tag = CZE_czechoslavakia
			
			leave_faction = yes
			separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = CZE
				}
					CZE = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			HUN = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_country_leader = {
									name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
							}
						}
						effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
					}
				
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					SVK = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = SVK
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
				SVK = { 
					leave_faction = yes
					separate_peace_all_wars = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						SVK = { NOT = { owns_state = 664 } }
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = 664
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				AUS = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				HUN = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_cze_approved }
			}
			CZE = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_slo_approved }
			}
			SVK = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusfor.1306.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1306.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1306.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 73 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 70 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 875 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		AUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1307
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 70 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 875 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			AUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = HUN

				}
			}
			separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			leave_faction = yes
			load_oob = HUN_AUS_Civil_war
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "Ten new militia divisions will be formed"
		declare_war_on = {
			target = AUS
			type = annex_everything
		}
		country_event = kr.hungary.2
	}

		}

		add_political_power = -50
	}

country_event = { #Russia agrees
	id = rusfor.1310
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1310" }
	title = rusfor.1310.t
	desc = rusfor.1310.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1310.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			HUN = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_leader = {
								name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
						}
					}

				}
			set_cosmetic_tag = CZE_czechoslavakia
			
			leave_faction = yes
			separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = CZE
				}
					CZE = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_country_leader = {
									name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
							}
						}
						effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
					}
				
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					SVK = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = SVK
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						SVK = {
							NOT = { 
							owns_state = 1122
							owns_state = 1136
							}
						} 
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = 1122
						transfer_state = 1136
					}
				}
				SVK = { 
					leave_faction = yes
					separate_peace_all_wars = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				AUS = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				HUN = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_cze_approved }
			}
			CZE = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_slo_approved }
			}
			SVK = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 69
		transfer_state = 71
		transfer_state = 74
		transfer_state = 786
		transfer_state = 1133
		transfer_state = 1138
		transfer_state = 1139
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = CZE
			relation = military_access
			active = yes
		}
	}
}

				add_state_core = 73
			}
		}

		add_state_core = 74
		add_state_core = 786

country_event = { #Free Illyria
	id = rusfor.1315
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1315" }
	title = rusfor.1305.t
	desc = rusfor.1305.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = illyria_independent_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CRO = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CRO
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CRO
							is_core_of = SLO
							is_core_of = BOS
							is_core_of = MNT
						}
					}
					CRO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
			CRO = { 
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = illyria_slovenia_croatia_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CRO = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CRO
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CRO
							is_core_of = BOS
						}
					}
					CRO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 102
							state = 1101
							state = 1103
							state = 1104
							state = 736
							state = 1100
							state = 1144
						}
					}
					SLO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
			CRO = { 
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = illyria_separate_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CRO = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CRO
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = CRO
					}
					CRO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 102
							state = 1101
							state = 1103
							state = 1104
							state = 736
							state = 1100
							state = 1144
						}
					}
					SLO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
			CRO = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						state = 104
					}
					BOS = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = CRO
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						state = 105
					}
					MNT = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = CRO
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = vojvodina_croatia_approved }
			}
			CRO = {
				transfer_state = 45
				add_state_core = 73
				transfer_state = 45
				add_state_core = 875
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1318
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1318" }
	title = rusfor.1318.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1318.d.serbia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vojvodina_serbia_approved }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1318.d.croatia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vojvodina_croatia_approved }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1319
						days = 5
					}
				}
		if = {
			limit = {
				HUN = { is_subject_of = AUS }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HUN = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1306
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1312
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Release Galicia
	id = rusfor.1321
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1321" }
	title = rusfor.1305.t
	desc = rusfor.1305.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = galicia_split_ukraine_approved }
			}
			10 = {
				owner = { 
					transfer_state = 88
					transfer_state = 1124
					transfer_state = 1125
					add_state_core = 88
					add_state_core = 1124
					add_state_core = 1125
				}
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
				add_state_core = 89
				add_state_core = 91
				add_state_core = 1126
				add_state_core = 1127
				add_state_core = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = galicia_split_russia_approved }
			}
			10 = {
				owner = { 
					transfer_state = 88
					transfer_state = 1124
					transfer_state = 1125
					add_state_core = 88
					add_state_core = 1124
					add_state_core = 1125
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = galicia_annex_russia_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 88
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1124
				transfer_state = 1125
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = eastgalicia_split_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = eastgalicia_ukraine_approved }
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
				add_state_core = 89
				add_state_core = 91
				add_state_core = 1126
				add_state_core = 1127
				add_state_core = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = bukowina_annex_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 80
				transfer_state = 713
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = bukowina_split_russia_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 80
			}
			46 = {
					owner = { transfer_state = 713 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = bukowina_split_ukraine_approved }
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 80
				add_state_core = 80
			}
			46 = {
					owner = { transfer_state = 713 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_ukr_approved }
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 73
				add_state_core = 73
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_rus_approved }
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 73
				add_state_core = 73
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1322" }
	title = rusfor.1322.t
	desc = rusfor.1322.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1313.a
		trigger = {
			tag = AUS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1325
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = { tag = CRO }
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1322
					days = 1
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1324
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1312
					days = 1
				}
				set_country_flag = austria_refuse_to_release_croats
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1323
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia agrees
	id = rusfor.1326
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1326" }
	title = rusfor.1310.t
	desc = rusfor.1326.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1326.a
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = CRO }
			SER = { 
				annex_country = {
					target = CRO
					transfer_troops = yes
				} 
			}
		}
		else = {
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CRO
						}
					}
					SER = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						state = 102
					}
					SER = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

					target = CRO
					transfer_troops = yes
				}

							is_core_of = CRO
						}
					}
					SER = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}

					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 102
							state = 1101

							state = 1104
							state = 736
							state = 1100
							state = 1144
						}
					}

						add_state_core = PREV
					}

			}
		}

country_event = { #Great Patriotic War
	id = rusfor.47
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.47" }
	title = rusfor.47.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.democratic_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.authoritarian_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.democratic_GER
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.authoritarian_GER
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = FRA
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		NOT = { soviets_exist = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.47.a #We will march through Avenue des Champs-Elysées!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.25
		increase_conscription = yes
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.47.b #We will march under Brandenburg Gate!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.25
		increase_conscription = yes
	}
}

	id = rusfor.51
	title = {
		text = rusfor.51.t.1812
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 252
				controls_state = 255
			}
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.51.t.1328
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 205
				controls_state = 242
				controls_state = 246
			}
		}
	}
	desc = rusfor.51.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		has_war = yes
		NOT = { soviets_exist = yes }
		controls_state = 219
		OR = {
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 252
				controls_state = 255
			}
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 205
				controls_state = 242
				controls_state = 246
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.51.a #There is nowhere to retreat, Moscow is behind us!
		add_political_power = -40
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = 5000
			producer = RUS
		}
		add_manpower = 30000
		hidden_effect = { load_oob = RUS_NEW_1812 }
		219 = {
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 3391
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 6414
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 9348
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3

			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker

				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Russia offers us an alliance
	id = rusfor.52
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.52" }
	title = rusfor.52.t
	desc = rusfor.52.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = LAT
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = LAT_FORPOL
					option = LAT_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = EST
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_guaranteed = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { gives_military_access_to = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { gives_military_access_to = GER }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = GER
				relation = military_access
				active = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = balkan_research
			#remove_ideas = SER_balkan_research_idea
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject = no
						NOT = {
							tag = ITA
						}
					}
					remove_from_tech_sharing_group = balkan_research
					#remove_ideas = SER_balkan_research_idea
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.54
						days = 3
						random = 72
					}
				}
				dismantle_faction = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_allied_@ROOT
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.53
					days = 3
					random = 72
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.b
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = LAT
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = LAT_FORPOL
					option = LAT_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = EST
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.58 days = 1 } }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = no }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = no }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = no }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = no }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.53
					days = 3
					random = 72
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
}

country_event = { #Country responds
	id = rusfor.53
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.53" }

	title = {
		text = rusfor.53.t.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.53.t.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.53.d.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.53.d.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.53.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM
		add_to_faction = FROM
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = EST
						tag = LAT
						tag = LIT
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_will_liberate_baltic
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.53.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = EST
						tag = LAT
						tag = LIT
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_will_annex_baltic
		}
	}
}

		text = rusfor.55.d.ROM
		trigger = {
			FROM = { tag = ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.55.d.other
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = { tag = ROM }
			}
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

		name = rusfor.55.a

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				FROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
				FROM = { owns_state = 1222 } #Bessarabia
			}
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = ROM }
				}

					embargo_FROM = yes
					FROM = { embargo_PREV = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.55.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {

			}

	}

country_event = { #Country wants their claims back
	id = rusfor.58
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.58 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = rusfor.58.t
	desc = rusfor.58.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.58.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.6
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_to_faction = FROM
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.59 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.58.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.60 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia accepts
	id = rusfor.59
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.59 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = rusfor.59.t
	desc = rusfor.59.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.59.a
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = FROM }
					remove_claim_by = FROM
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = FROM }
				remove_claim_by = FROM
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.70.a #Agree
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				FIN = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
				RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
				add = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				FIN = { 
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = FIN_mannerheim_victory
				}
				RUS = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
				add = 100
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		effect_tooltip = { RUS = { add_to_faction = FIN } }
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.53 hours = 8 } }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.70.b #No
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				FIN = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
				RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
				add = -100
			}
			modifier = {
				FIN = { 
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = FIN_mannerheim_victory
				}
				RUS = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
				add = -100
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.71 hours = 8 }
		}
	}
}

#Foreign Politics Focuses Events ###########################
country_event = { #The Trans-Siberian Crisis
	id = rusfor.62
	title = rusfor.62.t
	desc = rusfor.62.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS 
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Mongolian_Issue }
		329 = { is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = no }
		MON = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = MON_russia_friendship } }
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = MON
			is_in_faction_with = MON
		}
		MON = {
			is_subject = no 
			exists = yes 
			controls_state = 811
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.62.a #We must increase the security on our trains.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = MON
			modifier = medium_decrease
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.62.b #Demand a formal apology from the Mongolian government!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		MON = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.63
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.62.c #Enough! We demand full sovereignty over OUR Trans-Siberian railway!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		MON = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.66
			}
		}
		add_state_claim = 329
		add_state_core = 654
		add_state_core = 811
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.62.e #We shall bring civilization where there is barbarism, send the troops!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		MON = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.69
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = MON type = annex_everything
		}
		add_state_claim = 329
		add_state_core = 654
		add_state_core = 811
	}

}

country_event = { #Germany invites DKB/GEO/AZE to the Reichspakt
	id = rusfor.1001
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1001" }
	title = rusfor.1001.t
	desc = rusfor.1001.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1001.a #Accept
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				don_is_pro_russian = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				kuban_is_pro_russian = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = DKB }
			every_country = { #GEO & AZR
				limit = { 
					tag = KLY
					has_socialist_government = no
					has_war = no
					is_subject = no
					is_in_faction = no
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1001
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = GEO }
			every_country = { #GEO & AZR
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						tag = MTR
						tag = AZE
					}
					has_socialist_government = no
					has_war = no
					is_subject = no
					is_in_faction = no
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1001
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1002
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}		
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1001.b #Refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis
					option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
