country_event = { #Russia ignored demands
	id = rusfor.1006
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1006" }
	title = rusfor.1006.t
	desc = rusfor.1006.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1006.a #Cease all contacts between the Völkerbund and Russia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			remove_from_faction = FROM
		}
		embargo_FROM = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = ROOT.faction_members
				RUS = { embargo_PREV = yes }
			}
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1007
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1006.c #Back down, we cannot afford a conflict with Russia.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			country_exists = FRA
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_global_flag = AXIS_VICTORY }
					TUR = { is_subject = no }
				}
				TUR = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ottfor.51 
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Mitteleuropa ceases all contacts with us RUS
	id = rusfor.1007
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1007" }
	title = rusfor.1007.t
	desc = rusfor.1007.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1007.a #I WILL SURVIVE
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_ideas = rus_ceased_contacts_germany
		RUS_remove_riga_accords = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_global_flag = AXIS_VICTORY }
					TUR = { is_subject = no }
				}
				TUR = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ottfor.51 
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
news_event = { #The Caucasus Crisis
	id = rusfor.1008
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1008" }
	title = rusfor.1008.t
	desc = rusfor.1008.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_006

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1008.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1008.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GER
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1008.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = GER
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Baku Oil Fields
	id = rusfor.1020
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1020" }
	title = rusfor.1020.t
	desc = rusfor.1020.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_azerbaijan
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1020.a #Take over the Baku Oil Concern and control their Government!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -150
		send_equipment = {
			target = AZE
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = 2000
		}
		AZE = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1021
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1020.b #Guarantee the security of Azerbaijan and invest in the oil fields.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		give_guarantee = AZE
		AZE = {
			every_owned_state = { remove_claim_by = ROOT }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1276
				days = 125
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1020.e #We shall take back our stolen plants by force, right now!
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AZE = { 
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes 
						is_guaranteed_by = GER
						is_subject = yes
					}
				}
			}				
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = AZE 
			type = annex_everything
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 3 
			name = rusfor.1020.t
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian Investment AZE
	id = rusfor.1021
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1021" }
	title = rusfor.1021.t
	desc = rusfor.1021.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1021.a #Invite the Russians to protect and develop Azerbaijan.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1023
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				send_equipment = {
					target = AZE
					type = infantry_equipment
					amount = 2000
				}
			}
		}
		990 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	} 

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1021.b #Decline the offer, attempt to limit Russian influence!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1022
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		ARM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1042
				days = 5
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #GER Russia demands concessions in the Caucasus
	id = rusfor.1048
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1048" }
	title = rusfor.1048.t
	desc = rusfor.1048.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1048.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		FROM = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = PREV
					autonomy_state = autonomy_free
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
			leave_faction = yes
			country_event = rusfor.1050
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1053
					days = 1
					random = 24
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1054
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1048.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1049
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans refused our demands
	id = rusfor.1049
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1049" }
	title = rusfor.1049.t
	desc = rusfor.1049.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1049.a #Declare war upon the Völkerbund!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = DKB
					is_in_faction_with = GEO
					is_in_faction_with = AZE
					is_in_faction_with = ARM
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1049.b #Ignore german guarantees
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = DKB
					is_in_faction_with = GEO
					is_in_faction_with = AZE
					is_in_faction_with = ARM
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							region = 134 #Caucasus
							region = 135 #Kuban
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = non_aggression_pact
						active = no
					}
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = guarantee
						active = no
					}
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = military_access
						active = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}

		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER

country_event = { #Russia demands northern iran
	id = rusfor.1066
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1066" }
	title = rusfor.1066.t
	desc = rusfor.1066.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1066.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				FROM = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -25
				FROM = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_war = yes
				surrender_progress > 0.1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
					transfer_state = 420
					transfer_state = 418
					transfer_state = 804
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER }
					add_to_faction = ROOT
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }					
					puppet = ROOT
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1067
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1066.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_political_power = 10
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1068
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia Demands We Surrender Greater Armenia OTT
	id = rusfor.1071
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1071" }
	title = rusfor.1071.t
	desc = rusfor.1071.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1071.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_allied_country = {
					is_actual_major = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_guaranteed_by = GER
					is_guaranteed_by = ENT
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				transfer_state = 1000
				transfer_state = 1001
				transfer_state = 1213
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1072
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1071.b #Never! stand up!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1073
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #OTT/TUR accepts
	id = rusfor.1072
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1072" }
	title = rusfor.1072.t
	desc = rusfor.1072.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1072.a #Hurray!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_subject = ARM
					has_subject = GEO
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		transfer_state = 1000
		transfer_state = 1001
		transfer_state = 1213
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1072.b #Give the land to our puppets!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_subject = ARM
				has_subject = GEO
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_subject = ARM
			}
			ARM = { transfer_state = 1000 }
			remove_state_claim = 1000
		}
		else = {
			transfer_state = 1000
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_subject = GEO
			}
			GEO = { transfer_state = 1001 }
			remove_state_claim = 1001
		}
		else = {
			transfer_state = 1001
		}
	}
}

				}
			}

			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything

country_event = { #Crush Transamur
	id = rusfor.1082
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1082" }
	title = rusfor.1082.t
	desc = rusfor.1082.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_transamur
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1082.a #all Russians must be under Russian rule! claim TRM
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
					is_subject_of = JAP
					is_in_faction_with = JAP
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism }
				JAP = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1084
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				JAP = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1083
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = JAP }
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.10877
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = FROM
				type = annex_everything
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						country_exists = YAK
						country_exists = BRY
						country_exists = SIB
					}
				}
				RUS = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.10820
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = TRM }
				}
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.7
					days = 1
				}
			}
			}
		}
	}
}

			target = BRY
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

			factor = 50

				factor = 5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}

country_event = { #The Russians claim Transamur!
	id = rusfor.1083
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1083" }
	title = rusfor.1083.t
	desc = rusfor.1083.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1083.a #Send a warning, Transamur is our protectorate!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1088
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1083.b #Abandon Transamur to its fate.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			TRM = {
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_INF_START
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_INF_TRADE
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_DEP_1
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_DEP_2
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_DEP_3
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_NAV_MIS
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_MIL_MIS
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_CONS
				remove_ideas = hino_automobile
				remove_ideas = nakajima_factory_vladivostok
			}
		}
		remove_from_faction = TRM
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRM
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.10877
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusfor.1087.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1087.a #Put their leaders on trial and incorporate Transamur!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { 
				FROM = { tag = SIB }
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = SIB
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
		else = {
			annex_country = {
				target = TRM
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1087.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				FROM = { tag = SIB }
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = SIB
				autonomy_state = kr_occupied_puppet
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRM
				autonomy_state = kr_occupied_puppet
			}
			TRM = { drop_cosmetic_tag = YES }
		}		
	}
}

country_event = { #The Russians ask for Transamur
	id = rusfor.1092
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1092" }
	title = rusfor.1092.t
	desc = rusfor.1092.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1092.a #RUSKIE FACTORIES FOR THE CO PROSPERITY GRINDSET
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.35
				RUS = {
					any_enemy_country = {
						OR = {
							is_actual_major = yes
							is_chinese_tag = yes
						}
						NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
					}
					surrender_progress > 0
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.6
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.8 }
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_allies_JAP_flag }
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1093
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1092.b #Refuse, Transamur is ours!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					is_ai = no 
					same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_is_eurasia = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					surrender_progress > 0.2
					NOT = {
						controls_state = 525
						controls_state = 527
						controls_state = 536
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio < 1
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_foreign_policy
					option = RUS_FOREIGN_POLICY_JAPAN
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.10877
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.1094.a #yay, annex
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_negotiated_entry_eco_cps
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = JAP
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = no
		}
		JAP = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		annex_country = {
			target = TRM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_co_prosperity_penalties
			add_to_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = ROOT }
			JAP_recalculate_economic_integration = yes
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = JAP_asian_economic_sphere_member }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1094.b #yay, puppet
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_negotiated_entry_eco_cps
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = JAP
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = no
		}
		JAP = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_co_prosperity_penalties
			add_to_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = ROOT }
			JAP_recalculate_economic_integration = yes
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = JAP_asian_economic_sphere_member }
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRM
			autonomy_state = kr_occupied_puppet
		}
		TRM = { drop_cosmetic_tag = YES }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Russians ask to join
	id = rusfor.1096
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1096" }
	title = rusfor.1096.t
	desc = rusfor.1096.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1096.a #Why not
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 98
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.3
				RUS = {
					any_enemy_country = {
						OR = {
							is_actual_major = yes
							is_chinese_tag = yes
						}
						NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
					}
					surrender_progress > 0
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.8 }
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_allies_JAP_flag
			country_event = rusfor.1097
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = RUS
						is_core_of = TRM
					}
					NOT = { is_core_of = JAP }
				}
				transfer_state_to = RUS
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1096.b #Refuse, filthy slavs
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					is_ai = no 
					same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_is_eurasia = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					surrender_progress > 0.2
					NOT = {
						controls_state = 525
						controls_state = 527
						controls_state = 536
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio < 1
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_foreign_policy
					option = RUS_FOREIGN_POLICY_JAPAN
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = { country_event = rusfor.1098 }
	}
}

country_event = { #We get into CPS
	id = rusfor.1097
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1094" }
	title = rusfor.1097.t
	desc = rusfor.1097.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1097.a #yay
		JAP = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = RUS
							is_core_of = TRM
						}
						NOT = { is_core_of = JAP }
					}
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_co_prosperity_treaty
			days = 600
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_co_prosperity_penalties
			add_to_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = ROOT }
			JAP_recalculate_economic_integration = yes
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = JAP_asian_economic_sphere_member }
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
				is_subject = no
			}
			RUS = { remove_from_faction = PREV }
			JAP = { add_to_faction = PREV }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Vladivostok is Russian!
	id = rusfor.1208
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1208"}
	title = rusfor.1208.t
	desc = rusfor.1208.d
	#picture = GFX_petain_NFA

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.a #We shall seize and convert all of the ships in the harbour!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_EVENT_CV01_naval_variant = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "Man the Guns"
				}
				set_technology = {
					early_ship_hull_carrier = 1
					popup = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_dlc = "Man the Guns"
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					early_carrier = 1
					popup = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = { load_oob = RUS_TRM_NAVY_BIG }
		}
		add_political_power = -80
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = convoy_1
			amount = 50
			producer = RUS
		}
		408 = {
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex level = 2
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = dockyard
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_big
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			hidden_effect = { load_oob = SOV_TRM_NAVY_BIG }
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.b #We shall merely use Transamur's old naval designs.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = { load_oob = RUS_TRM_NAVY_SMALL }
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_small
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = convoy_1
			amount = 30
			producer = RUS
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			hidden_effect = { load_oob = SOV_TRM_NAVY_SMALL }
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.c #Sell off Transamur's navy and convert the harbour for civilian purposes.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_sold
		}
		408 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.e #Sell off Transamur's navy and keep the money.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_sold
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				state_population > 200000
				free_building_slots = {
					building = arms_factory
					size > 0
					include_locked = yes
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #Ultimatum for Galicia AUS owns it
	id = rusfor.1210
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1210" }
	title = rusfor.1210.t
	desc = rusfor.1210.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1210.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = { has_subject = GAL }
			if = {
				limit = {
					GAL = { owns_state = 73 }
				}
				transfer_state = 73
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = GAL
				autonomy_state = autonomy_free
			}
			remove_from_faction = GAL
			GAL = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1222
					days = 1
					random = 24
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FROM
						is_claimed_by = FROM
						AND = {
							is_claimed_by = ROM
							ROM = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1211
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1210.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1212
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #AUS accepts
	id = rusfor.1211
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1211" }
	title = rusfor.1211.t
	desc = rusfor.1211.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1211.a #great
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_annex_GAL }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_annex_GAL
			annex_country = {
				target = GAL
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						AND = {
							is_claimed_by = ROM
							ROOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROM }
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian claims FIN
	id = rusfor.1229
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1229" }
	title = rusfor.1229.t
	desc = rusfor.1229.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1229.a #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = FIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1230
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1229.b #All right.
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = FIN
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -150
		effect_tooltip = {
			FIN = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = FROM
							is_claimed_by = FROM
							state = 146 #Viipuri
							state = 147 #
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = FIN }
			custom_effect_tooltip = received_equipment_5000
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					impassable = no
					free_building_slots = { building = industrial_complex size > 0 include_locked = yes }
				}
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 1
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1231
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.1231
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1231" }
	title = rusfor.1231.t
	desc = rusfor.1231.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1231.a #Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = {
				KAR = {
					exists = yes
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = KAR
			}
		}		
		FIN = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 146 #Viipuri
						state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				ROOT = { add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = PREV } }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { tag = FIN }
			}
			send_equipment = {
				target = FROM
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = 5000
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #We've been defeated! FIN
	id = rusfor.1232
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1232" }
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1232.t.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }	
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1232.defeat
		trigger = {
			surrender_progress > 0.2	
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1232.d.defeat
		trigger = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1232.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		has_war_with = 219.owner
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_enemy_tag = 219.owner }
		var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
			is_russian_tag_that_can_integrate = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = KAR }
			KAR = { has_socialist_government = no }
		}
		OR = {
			#Finland loses
			surrender_progress > 0.2
			#Finland wins
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = { surrender_progress > 0.1 }
			controls_state = 195 #Petrograd
			AND = {
				controls_state = 213 #Murmansk
				OR = {
				controls_state = 215 #Kem
					KAR = { controls_state = 215 }
				}
				OR = {
					controls_state = 1274 #Kem
					KAR = { controls_state = 1274 }
				}
				OR = {
				controls_state = 216 #Petrozavodsk
					KAR = { controls_state = 216 }
				}
				controls_state = 722 #Petsamo
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_offered_peace }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_FIN_offered_peace days = 90 value = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1232.a #Sue for peace!
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1233
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1232.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Finland?
	id = rusfor.1233
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1233" }
	title = rusfor.1233.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1233.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1233.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		has_war_with = FROM
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1233.a #Accept the peace offer!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
				FROM = { is_ai = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1234 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1233.b #No, they shall be crushed!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
				FROM = { is_ai = yes }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
			add_stability = -0.15
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -50
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1235 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Petrograd FIN
	id = rusfor.1234
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1234" }
	title = rusfor.1234.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1234.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1234.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1234.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = KAR }
			if = {
				limit = {
					KAR = { is_subject_of = FROM }
				}
				146 = { 
					transfer_state_to = KAR
					add_core_of = KAR
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 146 #Viipuri
					state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { region = 13 } #Finland
					state = 146 #Viipuri
					state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
				}
			}
			transfer_state_to = FROM
			FROM = { add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = PREV } }
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
		}		
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1234.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = { country_exists = KAR }
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = KAR
							is_claimed_by = KAR
						}
					}
					KAR = { transfer_state = PREV }
				}
				KAR = { separate_peace_all_wars = yes }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 146 #Viipuri
						state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
						state = 213 #Murmansk
						state = 215 #Kem
						state = 1274 #Kem
						state = 216 #Petrozavodsk
						state = 722 #Petsamo
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }		
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #ROM-RUS peace deal
	id = rusfor.1236
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1236" }
	title = rusfor.1236.t
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1236.t.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1236.d.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1236.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1236.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ROM
		has_war_with = 219.owner
		owns_state = 78
		owns_state = 1222
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_enemy_tag = 219.owner }
		var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
			is_russian_tag_that_can_integrate = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		OR = {
			#Romania loses
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
				controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
				controls_state = 1222 # Bujak
				controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
			}
			surrender_progress > 0.15
			#Romania wins
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = { surrender_progress > 0.1 }
			controls_state = 202 #Kiev
			controls_state = 226 #Ekaterinoslav
			AND = {
				controls_state = 192 #Odessa
				controls_state = 791 #Podolia
				OR = {
					controls_state = 197 #Kherson
					controls_state = 198 #Vinnitsa
					controls_state = 1245 #Bratslav
					controls_state = 199 #Proskurov
					controls_state = 1241 #Pobuzhie
					controls_state = 1233 #Elisavetgrad
					controls_state = 1232 #Nikolayev
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace days = 90 value = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					surrender_progress > 0.15
					NOT = { controls_state = 78 }
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.a #We have no choice; send word to Moscow.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1237 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.c #We prevail!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1237 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.d #No, they must be taught a lesson.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Romania?
	id = rusfor.1237
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1237" }
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1237.t.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1237.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	title = {
		text = rusfor.1237.t.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1237.d.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		has_war_with = FROM
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.a #Accept; no point in wasting any more Russian lives.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1238 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.b #Refuse; they must be taught a lesson!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1239 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.c #Reach out to the Romanians; this humiliation must end.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1238 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.b #To hell with them! We will reach Kishinev at all costs!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1239 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Chisinau
	id = rusfor.1238
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1238" }
	title = rusfor.1238.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1238.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1238.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1238.a #United just to be torn asunder again...
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 1222
					if = {
						limit = {
							FROM = { owns_state = 89 } #Stanislawow
						}
						state = 80 #Cernauti
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			FROM = { add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = PREV } }
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1238.b 
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		FROM = {
			remove_state_claim = 78 #Bessarabia
			remove_state_claim = 1222
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.1240.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		WHR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1241
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1240.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				WHR = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = WHR
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1240.c
		trigger = {
			WHR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		WHR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1248
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1265.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_political_power = -15
	}
}
country_event = { #WHR question
	id = rusfor.1241
	title = rusfor.1241.t
	desc = rusfor.1241.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1241.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_ULADZIMIR_DEMOCRACY_SOCIAL_DEMOCRAT_BSDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_SIGISMUND_COUP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_BPSF_GERMAN_INTERVENTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_BPSF_GERMAN_ACQUIESCENCE
					}					
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_ULADZIMIR_DEMOCRACY_SOCIAL_DEMOCRAT_BSDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_SIGISMUND_COUP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_BPSF_GERMAN_INTERVENTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_BPSF_GERMAN_ACQUIESCENCE
					}					
				}
			}
		}
		clear_all_relations = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = WHR_ANDRU
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Stanisłaŭ Bułak-Bałachowič"
			desc = "POLITICS_BULAK_BALACHOWIC_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Stanislaw_Bulak_Balachowicz.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = WHR_paternal_autocrat_party
			long_name = WHR_paternal_autocrat_party_long
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			WHR_Stanislav_Bulak_Balakhovich_hog_sco
			WHR_Vatslav_Lastovsky_for_pau
			WHR_Mikalaj_Skjalenak_eco_npo
			WHR_Jan_Stankievic_sec_npo
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
				RUS = {
					is_subject = no
					has_socialist_government = no
					has_left_democratic_government = no
					NOT = {
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					soviets_exist = yes
					has_war_with = RUS
				}
			}
			get_current_government_type = yes
			RUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = WHR
					autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				}
			}
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1242
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1241.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				WHR = { has_stability > 0.7 }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1249
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #WHR question
	id = rusfor.1242
	title = rusfor.1242.t
	desc = rusfor.1242.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1242.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1242.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				WHR = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = WHR
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = WHR
				}
				add_compliance = 20
			}
		}
		else = {
			WHR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1245
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #WHR bonds
	id = rusfor.1266
	title = rusfor.1266.t
	desc = rusfor.1266.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1266.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				RUS = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = WHR_foreign_policy
					option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_GERMAN_INTERVENTION
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1267
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1266.b
		trigger = {
			WHR = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = WHR_foreign_policy
					option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_GERMAN_ACQUIESCENCE
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1269
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1266.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				RUS = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_foreign_policy
						option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_GERMAN_INTERVENTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_foreign_policy
						option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_GERMAN_ACQUIESCENCE
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.12677
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #WHR bonds
	id = rusfor.1267
	title = rusfor.1267.t
	desc = rusfor.1267.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1267.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		WHR = {
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		puppet = WHR
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					WHR = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = WHR_republic_choosen }
					}
				}
				WHR = {
					set_country_flag = WHR_republic_choosen
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Usievalad Ihnatoŭski"
						desc = "POLITICS_USIEVALAD_IHNATOUSKI_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Usevalad_Ihnatouski.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = totalist_subtype
						}	

						create_country_leader = {
						name = "Tamaš Hryb"
						desc = "POLITICS_TAMAS_HRYB_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Tamas_Hryb.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = syndicalist_subtype
						}
						create_country_leader = {
						name = "Branisłaŭ Taraškievič"
						desc = "POLITICS_BRANISLAU_TARASKIEVIC_DESC_RADSOC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Branislau_Taraskievic.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
						}
						set_party_name = {
						ideology = totalist
									name = WHR_totalist_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_totalist_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = syndicalist
						name = WHR_syndicalist_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_syndicalist_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
									ideology = radical_socialist
						name = WHR_radical_socialist_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_radical_socialist_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = social_democrat
						name = WHR_social_democrat_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_social_democrat_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = social_liberal
						name = WHR_social_liberal_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_social_liberal_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = social_conservative
						name = WHR_social_conservative_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_social_conservative_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = authoritarian_democrat
						name = WHR_authoritarian_democrat_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_authoritarian_democrat_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = paternal_autocrat
						name = WHR_paternal_autocrat_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_paternal_autocrat_republic_party_long
					}
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = national_populist
						name = WHR_national_populist_republic_party
						long_name = WHR_national_populist_republic_party_long
					}
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Branisłaŭ Taraškievič"
						desc = "POLITICS_BRANISLAU_TARASKIEVIC_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Branislau_Taraskievic.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = socdem_democratic_socialism_subtype
					}

					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Mikola Abramčyk"
						desc = "POLITICS_MIKOLA_ABRAMCIK_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Mikola_Abramcyk.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = social_liberal_subtype
					}

					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Adam Stankievič"
						desc = "POLITICS_ADAM_STANKIEVIC_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Adam_Stankievic.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = market_liberal_subtype
					}

					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Adam Stankievič"
						desc = "POLITICS_ADAM_STANKIEVIC_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Adam_Stankievic.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = social_conservative_subtype
					}

					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Radasłaŭ Astroŭski"
						desc = "POLITICS_RADASLAU_ASTROUSKI_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Radaslau_Astrouski.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = authoritarian_democrat_subtype
					}

					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Radasłaŭ Astroŭski"
						desc = "POLITICS_RADASLAU_ASTROUSKI_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Radaslau_Astrouski.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}

					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Vacłaŭ Łastoŭski"
						desc = "POLITICS_VACLAU_LASTOUSKI_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Vaclau_Lastouski.png"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = national_populist_subtype
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					WHR = { is_subject_of = GER }
				}
				GER = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.12722
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1268
					days = 45
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #WHR bonds
	id = rusfor.12677
	title = rusfor.12677.t
	desc = rusfor.12677.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.12677.a
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				GER = { has_war_with = FRA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				WHR = { is_subject = no }
				WHR = { is_in_faction = no }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.12677.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = { add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = WHR
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
		}
	}
}

	title = rusfor.1268.t
	desc = rusfor.1268.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1268.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		annex_country = {
			target = WHR
			transfer_troops = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1268.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1270

	desc = rusfor.1270.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1270.a
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = WHR
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1270.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = WHR_foreign_policy
					option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_GERMAN_INTERVENTION
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		RUS = { add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = WHR
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
		}
		RUS = { add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Spiritual Administration of the Muslims of Central Asia
	id = rusfor.1273
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1273" }
	title = rusfor.1273.t
	desc = rusfor.1273.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_turkestan

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1273.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_political_power = 30
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1274
				days = 150
				random = 720
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1273.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_political_power = 10
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1275
				days = 150
				random = 720
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Pacification of Central Asia
	id = rusfor.1275
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1275" }
	title = rusfor.1275.t
	desc = rusfor.1275.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1275.a
		add_political_power = 20
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = KYR
					is_core_of = UZB
					is_core_of = TRK
				}
			}
			add_compliance = 10
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia invested in Azerbaijan
	id = rusfor.1276
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1276" }
	title = rusfor.1276.t
	desc = rusfor.1276.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1276.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
		}
		send_equipment = {
			target = AZE
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = 2000
		}
		AZE = {
			country_event = rusfor.1021
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1276.b #We don't need Azerbaijan
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1277
	title = rusfor.1277.t
	desc = rusfor.1277.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
	}

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1277"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1278
				days = 90
				random = 720
			}
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
		}
		name = rusfor.1277.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC1
		add_political_power = -30
	}

			factor = 35
		}

		set_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC2
		add_political_power = -20
	}

			factor = 20
		}
		name = rusfor.1277.c
		set_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC3
		add_political_power = -40
	}
}

country_event = { #Pacification of NC1
	id = rusfor.1278
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1278" }
	title = rusfor.1278.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1278.d1
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC1 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1278.d2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC2 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1278.d3
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC3 }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1278.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC1
		clr_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC2
		clr_country_flag = RUS_CAUC_PAC3
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_political_power = -20
		232 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 2.0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1279
				days = 60
				random = 720
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Ottomans are Collapsing!
	id = rusfor.12810
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.12810" }
	title = rusfor.12810.t
	desc = rusfor.12810.d
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			1000 = {
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = TUR
					is_owned_by = TUR
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
				}
			}
			1001 = {
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = TUR
					is_owned_by = TUR
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12810.a #Seize Greater Armenia!
		TUR = {
			country_event = rusfor.12810
			hidden_effect = {
				every_enemy_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = EGY
							tag = PER
						}
					}
					country_event = rusfor.1281
				}
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 1000
		transfer_state = 1001
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12810.b #It's too risky.
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia Seizes Greater Armenia!
	id = rusfor.12820
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.12820" }
	title = rusfor.12820.t
	
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.12820.d.OTT
		trigger = { tag = TUR }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.12820.d.other
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = TUR }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12820.a
		trigger = { tag = TUR }
		add_political_power = -50
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12820.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = TUR }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Question of Kuban
	id = rusfor.1280
	title = rusfor.1280.t
	desc = rusfor.1280.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_kuban
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1280.a #Start consulting with ukraine
		trigger = {
			KUB = { OR = {
				is_guaranteed_by = UKR
				is_puppet = yes
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				NOT = { has_idea = rus_ceased_contacts_germany }
				UKR = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1281
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1280.b #Start sending agitators
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
		}
		KUB = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1286
				days = 14
			}
		}
	}
}

	trigger = {

			tag = RUS
		}

		name = rusfor.1281.a #ok
		add_political_power = -30
		KUB = {

			}
		}
	}

		FROM = {

				id = rusfor.1285
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}

country_event = { #Russia wants to seize us! KUB
	id = rusfor.1282
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1282" }
	title = rusfor.1282.t
	desc = rusfor.1282.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1282.a #strike
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = rusfor.1283
			}
		}
		else = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = SOV
				type = annex_everything
			}
			SOV = {
				country_event = rusfor.1283
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1282.b #surrender
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1284
					days = 1
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1284
					days = 1
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1401
	title = rusfor.1401.t
	desc = rusfor.1401.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_kvzhd
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
	NOT = {
		883 = {
			OR = {
				is_owned_by = TRM
				is_owned_by = RUS
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1401.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				883 = {
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_owned_by = TRM
							is_owned_by = RUS
						}
					}
				}
			}
			var:883.owner = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1402
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Kvzhd
	id = rusfor.1402
	title = rusfor.1402.t
	desc = rusfor.1402.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_kvzhd
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			OR = {
			tag = RUS
			tag = TRM
			tag = SOV
			}
		}
	}	

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1402.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = Russia_Supports_Us
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			transfer_state = 885
			transfer_state = 884
			transfer_state = 883
			transfer_state = 714
			transfer_state = 717
			add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = 885 }
			add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = 884 }
			add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = 883 }
			add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = 714 }
			add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = 717 }
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1403
				days = 2
			}
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1402.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		give_military_access = FROM
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1405
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1402.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1404
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #zheltorossiya
	id = rusfor.1407
	title = rusfor.1407.t
	desc = rusfor.1407.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1407.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_manchuria = yes
				}
				MAN = {
					remove_state_core = yes
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 610
					state = 715
					state = 716
					state = 328
					state = 886
					state = 885
				}
			}
			MAN = {
				add_state_core = PREV
				transfer_state = PREV
			}
		}
		puppet = MAN
		MAN = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Konstantin Nechaev"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Konstantin_Nechaev.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = MAN_russian_party_long
				name = MAN_russian_party
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = MAN_ZRO
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_eurasian_integration
				days = 400
			}
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = 218
					region = 222
				}
			}
			add_claim_by = MAN
		}
		MAN = { save_global_event_target_as = china_ally_target }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1407.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #vladivostok captured
	id = rusfor.1422
	title = rusfor.1422.t
	desc = rusfor.1422.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		controls_state = 408
		has_war_with = TRM
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1422.a
		remove_ideas = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
		TRM = { separate_peace_all_wars = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { is_subject_of = JAP }
			}
			white_peace = JAP
		}
		annex_country = {
			target = TRM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1422.b
		trigger = {
			TRM = { is_subject_of = JAP }
		}
		remove_ideas = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
		TRM = { separate_peace_all_wars = yes }
		annex_country = {
			target = TRM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = JAP
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.14220
	title = rusfor.1422.t
	desc = rusfor.1422.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		has_idea = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
		TRM = { exists = no }
	}
	option = {
		remove_ideas = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
	} 
}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1430
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1424.b
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = INT
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1431
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1424.c
		trigger = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1432
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1429.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {

country_event = { #Alaska
	id = rusfor.1430
	title = rusfor.1430.t
	desc = rusfor.1430.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1425.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		send_equipment = { target = FROM type = infantry_equipment amount = 25000 }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_Alaska_Purchase
			days = 720
		}
		FROM = { 
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_Alaska_Sale
				days = 720
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 463
		hidden_effect = {
			set_province_name = { id = 13091 name = "Ankoridzh" }
			463 = { set_state_name = "Alyaska" }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1428.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1430.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.1425.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = -10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Declare_War_On_Internationale_tooltip
		activate_mission = RUS_Declare_War_On_Internationale
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = military_access
			active = yes
		}
	}

		name = rusfor.1425.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -20
				num_faction_members > 4
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_Alaska_Purchase
			days = 720
		}
		FROM = { 
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_Alaska_Sale
				days = 720
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 463
		hidden_effect = {
			set_province_name = { id = 13091 name = "Ankoridzh" }
			463 = { set_state_name = "Alyaska" }
		}
	}

		name = rusfor.1428.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				has_war = yes
			}

country_event = { #green vozhd
	id = rusfor.1435
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1435" }
	title = rusfor.1435.t
	desc = rusfor.1435.d
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_vozhd

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1435.a
		hidden_effect = {	
			if = {	
				limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Pavel Gorgulov" ruling_only = yes } }
				set_country_leader_portrait = {
					portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Gorgulov_Vohzd.png"
				}
			set_country_flag = Gorgulov_Hat
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = green_vozhd
		}
	}
}
	
country_event = { #Alaska Integration
	id = rusfor.1436
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1436.t
	desc = rusfor.1436.d
	trigger = {
		tag =  ALA
		OR = {
			is_subject_of = RUS
			is_subject_of = SOV
			is_subject_of = TRM
		}
		NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ALA_RUS }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1436.a
		set_cosmetic_tag = ALA_RUS
		hidden_effect = {
			set_province_name = { id = 13091 name = "Ankoridzh" }
			463 = { set_state_name = "Alyaska" }
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = "Rossiyskaya Administratsiya"
				name = "Rossiyskaya Administratsiya"
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = market_liberal_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = totalist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	}
}

			factor = 50

				add = -30
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

		name = rusfor.1437.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_subject_of = CAN
					is_subject_of = JAP
				}
			}
		}
		ALA = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1438
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = rusfor.1437.c
		trigger = {
			ALA = { is_subject_of = CAN }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -30

			}

			}
		}

			}

				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
