country_event = { # Russia Demands Puppet Alaska
	id = rusfor.1439
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1429.t
	desc = rusfor.1429.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1439.a #Let them decide but we won't back them up militarily.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		ALA = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1440
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1429.e #We're keeping it.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1441
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Surrender
		name = rusfor.1429.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ALA
				autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}	

country_event = { # Puppet Alaska - On Our Own
	id = rusfor.1440
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1440.t
	desc = rusfor.1440.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.a # Surrender
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.b # We'll fight, but we're on our own.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = ALA
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		ALA = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1438
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	
	}
}

			modifier = {

				has_war = no

					is_in_faction_with = CAN

				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # Alaska Surrenders
	id = rusfor.1442
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1442.t
	desc = rusfor.1442.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1442.a
		puppet = ALA
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Fate of Turkestan
	id = rusfor.1443
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1443" }
	title = rusfor.1443.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1443.d.united
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1443.d.notunited
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united }
		}
	}	
	picture = GFX_report_event_turkestan
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1444
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1447
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 25
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 25
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				tag = SOV
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			}
			UTR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1453
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KYR
				}
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = UZB
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = TRK
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1456
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.g
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united }
			OR = {
				KYR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				UZB = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				TRK = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = KYR
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					KYR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				}
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1444
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = UZB
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					UZB = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1444
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = TRK
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					TRK = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1444
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.f
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		trigger = {
			RUS_russian_monarch = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			}
			UTR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1459
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KYR
				}
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = UZB
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1456
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = TRK
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1456
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.h
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = UTR
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = UTR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KYR
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = KYR
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = UZB
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = UZB
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = TRK
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = TRK
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

	desc = rusfor.1444.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1444.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				tag = KYR
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -40
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1445
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1444.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				tag = KYR
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 40

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # Turkestan agreed
	id = rusfor.1445
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1445" }
	title = rusfor.1445.t
	desc = rusfor.1445.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1445.a
		FROM = { get_current_government_type = yes }
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		FROM = { restore_previous_government_type = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_socialist_government = no
			}
			FROM = { set_cosmetic_tag = UTR_autonomy } 
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Turkestan agreed
	id = rusfor.1460
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1460" }
	title = rusfor.1460.t
	desc = rusfor.1460.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1460.a
		hidden_effect = {
			annex_country = { target = FROM }
		}
		584 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
		add_to_array = { RUS_integration_state_array = 584 }
		UZB = {
			transfer_state = 861
			add_state_core = 861
		}		
		set_autonomy = {
			target = UZB
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		UZB = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 60
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			clr_country_flag = UZB_republic
			add_ideas = {
				UZB_Sayid_Abdullah_hog_pau
				UZB_Alisher_Ivanov_for_ade
				UZB_Bahauddin_Gorchakov_eco_ade
				UZB_Boris_Dmitrievsky_sec_sde
				TRK_last_of_genghis_khans 
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = {
					TRK_central_asian_repubic 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_1 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_2
					TRK_minorities_protected 
					TRK_soviet_insurgency  
					TRK_totalism   
					TRK_totalism_1	
					TRK_syndicalism	
					TRK_syndicalism_1	
					TRK_agrarian_socialism	
					TRK_agrarian_socialism_1		
					TRK_fraternization 
				}
			}
		}
		TRK = {
			transfer_state = 405
			transfer_state = 585
			transfer_state = 732
			add_state_core = 405
			add_state_core = 585
			add_state_core = 732
		}		
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRK
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		TRK = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 60
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				TRK_Ibrahim_Bek_hog_pau
				TRK_Mukhtar_Dzhangalin_for_ade
				TRK_Adilet_Rustamov_eco_ade
				TRK_Kush_Beggi_sec_pau
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_idea = TRK_legacy_of_emir
							has_idea = TRK_legacy_of_emir_1
							has_idea = TRK_legacy_of_emir_2
						}
					}
				}
				add_ideas = TRK_legacy_of_emir
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = {
					TRK_central_asian_repubic 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_1 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_2
					TRK_minorities_protected 
					TRK_soviet_insurgency  
					TRK_totalism   
					TRK_totalism_1	
					TRK_syndicalism	
					TRK_syndicalism_1	
					TRK_agrarian_socialism	
					TRK_agrarian_socialism_1		
					TRK_fraternization 
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Japan-RUS peace
	id = rusfor.1462
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1462" }
	title = rusfor.1462.t
	desc = rusfor.1462.d
	trigger = {
		tag = JAP
		OR = {
			has_war_with = RUS
			has_war_with = SOV
		}
		NOT = { country_exists = TRM }
		408 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		1246 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		409 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1462.a
		if = {
			limit = { 408 = { owner = { is_russian_tag = yes } } }
			408 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1463
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 409 = { owner = { is_russian_tag = yes } } }
			409 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1463
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 219 = { owner = { is_russian_tag = yes } } }
			219 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1463
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_war_with = RUS }
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1463
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1463
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Japan-RUS peace
	id = rusfor.1463
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1463" }
	title = rusfor.1463.t
	desc = rusfor.1463.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1462.a
		save_event_target_as = peace_country
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = JAP
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = JAP
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_asia = yes
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		JAP = { transfer_state = 408 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 1246 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 409 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 637 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 562 }
		637 = { add_claim_by = JAP }
		562 = { add_claim_by = JAP }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_chinese_tag = yes
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			release = PREV
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_war_support = -0.5
		set_truce = {
			target = FROM
			days = 900
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1480
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1480" }
	title = rusfor.1480.t
	desc = rusfor.1480.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1480.a
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes 
					tag = TRM
				}
				AND = {
					tag = RUS
					TRM = { is_ai = no }
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			remove_claim_by = FROM
			add_core_of = FROM
		}
		FROM = {
			annex_country = {
				target = ROOT
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1480.a
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					tag = TRM
				}
				AND = {
					tag = RUS
					TRM = { is_ai = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		annex_country = {
			target = FROM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}
	}	
}

	desc = rusfor.1481.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1481.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = 0.5 }
	}
}
country_event = { # Siberian War event
	id = rusfor.1482
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1482" }
	title = rusfor.1482.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1482.d.noyak
		trigger = { NOT = { country_exists = YAK } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1482.d
		trigger = { country_exists = YAK }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1482.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = YAK }
			annex_country = {
				target = YAK
			}
			add_state_core = 574
			574 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_yakut_autonomy }
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Yakuts
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_when_TRM_war_starts
			effect_tooltip = {
				transfer_state = 574
				add_state_core = 574
				574 = {
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_yakut_autonomy }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = 0.15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1482.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = -0.1 }
	}
}

country_event = { # Siberian War event
	id = rusfor.1486
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1486" }
	title = rusfor.1486.t
	desc = rusfor.1486.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1486.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = SIB }
			SIB = {
				every_unit_leader = { set_nationality = ROOT }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = SIB
					NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				}
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = SIB
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SIBERIAN_AUTONOMY_accepted
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_siberia = yes
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }  
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Oblastniki
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_when_TRM_war_starts
			effect_tooltip = {
				TRM = {
					every_unit_leader = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_id = 505055
								has_id = 50004
							}
						}
						set_nationality = ROOT
					}
					set_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_banned
					remove_ideas = TRM_oblastniki_influence_idea
					hidden_effect = {
						remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TRM_oblastniki_influence_modifier }
						set_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_banned
						clr_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_operate
						clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_stability
						clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_war_support
						clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_resource_gain
						clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_conscription
					}
					set_political_party = {
						ideology = social_liberal
						popularity = 5
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 565
				remove_state_claim = 565
				add_state_core = 565
				set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SIBERIAN_AUTONOMY_accepted
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_siberia = yes
					}
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }  
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = 0.15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1486.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = -0.1 }
	}
}

		effect_tooltip = {
			TRM = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_id = 505053
							has_id = 505053
							has_id = 505058
						}
					}
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
				transfer_units_fraction = {
					target = ROOT
					size = 0.3
					navy_ratio = 0.1

				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}

			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.05
		}

			popularity = -0.05

country_event = { # Siberian War event
	id = rusfor.1489
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1489" }
	title = rusfor.1489.t
	desc = rusfor.1489.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1489.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_NRA
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_when_TRM_war_starts
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_template = "Gorodskaya Militsiya" }
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Gorodskaya Militsiya"
					division_names_group = SOV_GAR_01
					regiments = {
						militia = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			564 = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"1ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"2ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"3ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"4ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Revolyutsionnaya Diviziya imeni Blyukhera\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.3"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
			}
			create_field_marshal = {
				name = "Vasily Blyukher"
				portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/TRM/TRM_Vasily_Blyukher.png"
				id = 505050
				traits = {
					offensive_doctrine
					politically_connected
					trickster
				}
				skill = 3
				attack_skill = 3
				defense_skill = 1
				planning_skill = 2
				logistics_skill = 1
			}
			create_corps_commander = {
				name = "Genrikh Eikhe"
				portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/TRM/TRM_Genrikh_Eikhe.png"
				id = 505049
				traits = {
					politically_connected
					infantry_leader
					trait_engineer
				}
				skill = 2
				attack_skill = 1
				defense_skill = 2
				planning_skill = 1
				logistics_skill = 1
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = 0.15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1489.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = -0.1 }
	}

country_event = { # Siberian War event
	id = rusfor.1490
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1490" }
	title = rusfor.1490.t
	desc = rusfor.1490.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1490.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Cossacks_less_evil
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_when_TRM_war_starts
		effect_tooltip = {
			TRM = {
				add_stability = -0.08
				add_war_support = -0.08
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_id = 505054
							has_id = 505056
						}
					}
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = 0.15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1490.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Cossacks
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_when_TRM_war_starts
		effect_tooltip = {
			TRM = {
				delete_unit_template_and_units = {
					division_template = "Kazatskaya Diviziya"
					disband = yes
				}
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_id = 243910
							has_id = 505054
							has_id = 505056
							has_id = 243911
							has_id = 243912
						}
					}
					set_nationality = BRY
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 564
							state = 563
						}
					}
					BRY = {
						add_state_core = PREV
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_core_of = TRM }
					BRY = {
						add_state_claim = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			BRY = { 
				transfer_technology_without_doctrines = yes
				division_template = {
					name = "Kazatskaya Diviziya"
					division_names_group = TRM_CAV_01
					regiments = {
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					}
				}
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					prioritize = { 563 }
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 12641 
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 12641 
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 12641 
					}
				}
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					prioritize = { 564 }
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 7816 
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 7816 
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 7816 
					}
				}
				add_ideas = { DON_Cossack_state	}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = TRM
					type = civil_war
				}
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BRY
				autonomy_state = kr_nominal_puppet
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				BRY = {
					set_popularities = {
						totalist = 11
						radical_socialist = 5
						syndicalist = 0
						social_democrat = 0
						social_liberal = 17
						market_liberal = 0
						social_conservative = 2
						authoritarian_democrat = 0
						paternal_autocrat = 38
						national_populist = 27
					}
				}
			}
		}			
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = 0.25 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1490.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_political_power = 15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_chance_of_war
		add_to_variable = { siberian_war_chance = -0.05 }
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1491
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1491" }

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_war_with = TRM }

		name = rusfor.1491.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Cossacks_less_evil
			}

				add_stability = -0.08
				add_war_support = -0.08

							has_id = 505056
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}

				has_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Cossacks
			}

					}

							state = 563

					}

						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 12641 
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 12641 
					}
				}
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					prioritize = { 564 }
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 7816 
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 7816 
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "division_template = \"Kazatskaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
						owner = BRY
						prioritize_location = 7816 
					}
				}
				add_ideas = { DON_Cossack_state	}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = TRM
					type = civil_war
				}
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BRY
				autonomy_state = kr_nominal_puppet
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				BRY = {
					set_popularities = {
						totalist = 11
						radical_socialist = 5
						syndicalist = 0
						social_democrat = 0
						social_liberal = 17
						market_liberal = 0
						social_conservative = 2
						authoritarian_democrat = 0
						paternal_autocrat = 38
						national_populist = 27
					}
				}
			}
		}			
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_ROVS }
			TRM = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_id = 505053
							has_id = 505053
							has_id = 505058
						}
					}
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
				transfer_units_fraction = {
					target = ROOT
					size = 0.3
					navy_ratio = 0.1
					keep_unit_leaders_trigger = { always = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_NRA }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_template = "Gorodskaya Militsiya" }
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Gorodskaya Militsiya"
					division_names_group = SOV_GAR_01
					regiments = {
						militia = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			564 = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"1ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"2ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"3ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"4ya Chitinskaya Druzhina NRA\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.1"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Revolyutsionnaya Diviziya imeni Blyukhera\" division_template = \"Gorodskaya Militsiya\" start_experience_factor = 0.3"
					owner = ROOT
					allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
				}
			}
			create_field_marshal = {
				name = "Vasily Blyukher"
				portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/TRM/TRM_Vasily_Blyukher.png"
				id = 505050
				traits = {
					offensive_doctrine
					politically_connected
					trickster
				}
				skill = 3
				attack_skill = 3
				defense_skill = 1
				planning_skill = 2
				logistics_skill = 1
			}
			create_corps_commander = {
				name = "Genrikh Eikhe"
				portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/TRM/TRM_Genrikh_Eikhe.png"
				id = 505049
				traits = {
					politically_connected
					infantry_leader
					trait_engineer
				}
				skill = 2
				attack_skill = 1
				defense_skill = 2
				planning_skill = 1
				logistics_skill = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Oblastniki }
			TRM = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_id = 505055
							has_id = 50004
						}
					}
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
				set_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_banned
				remove_ideas = TRM_oblastniki_influence_idea
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TRM_oblastniki_influence_modifier }
					set_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_banned
					clr_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_operate
					clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_stability
					clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_war_support
					clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_resource_gain
					clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_conscription
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 5
				}
			}
			transfer_state = 565
			remove_state_claim = 565
			add_state_core = 565
			set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SIBERIAN_AUTONOMY_accepted
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_siberia = yes
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }  
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Buryats }
			transfer_state = 564
			add_state_core = 564
			564 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_buryat_autonomy }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_Siberian_War_Yakuts }
			transfer_state = 574
			add_state_core = 574
			574 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_yakut_autonomy }
			}
		}
	}
}

# RUS Separate Peace Treaties
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1500
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1500" }
	title = rusfor.1500.t
	desc = rusfor.1500.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1500.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100 
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1501
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1500.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_war_support = -0.05
	}	
}

country_event = { #Danzig Treaty
	id = rusfor.1516
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1516" }
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = ROOT }
				}
				news_event = {
					id = rusfor.1518
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusfor.1516.t
	desc = rusfor.1516.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1516.a
		setup_danzig_treaty = yes
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		set_truce = {
			target = GER
			days = 2900
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = GER
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		GER = { add_ideas = GER_danzig_treaty }
	}			
}

country_event = { #Austrian Peace treaty
	id = rusfor.1522
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1522" }
	title = rusfor.1522.t
	desc = rusfor.1522.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1522.a
		save_event_target_as = peace_country
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
				}
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		set_truce = {
			target = FROM
			days = 1200
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}	
}

		add_war_support = -0.02
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = "White peace will be signed until Treaty of Budapest is ratified."
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.1526
			days = 30
		}
		save_event_target_as = peace_country
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = AUS
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_subject_of = AUS
					is_in_faction_with = AUS
				}
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		set_truce = {
			target = AUS
			days = 1200
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #Treaty of Budapest
	id = rusfor.1526
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1526" }
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = ROOT }
				}
				news_event = rusfor.1527
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusfor.1526.t
	desc = rusfor.1526.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1526.a
		setup_budapest_treaty = yes
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = AUS
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		AUS = { add_ideas = AUS_budapest_treaty }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = HUN
					tag = CZE
					tag = CRO
					tag = GAL
				}
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = AUS
					is_subject_of = AUS
				}
			}
			add_ideas = AUS_budapest_treaty
		}
	}	
}

# RUS Violates Treaty
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1600
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1600" }
	title = rusfor.1600.t
	desc = rusfor.1600.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus }
		tag = GER
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_1
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_renegotiated
			}
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = UKR }
				UKR = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = WHR }
				WHR = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = FIN }
				FIN = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = LIT }
				LIT = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = BAT }
				BAT = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}				
			}
		}	
	}	

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1600.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1601
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1600.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
}
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1601
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1601" }
	title = rusfor.1601.t
	desc = rusfor.1601.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1601.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_target_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_faction_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_overlord_is_stronger = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk }
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk_1
		}
		RUS_remove_riga_accords = yes
		add_named_threat = { 
			threat = 7
			name = "Russia Repudiated Minsk Treaty!"
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1602
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1600.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = {
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_target_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_faction_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_overlord_is_stronger = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = UKR
					tag = FIN
					tag = LIT
					tag = BAT
					tag = WHR
					is_ally_with = UKR
					is_ally_with = FIN
					is_ally_with = LIT
					is_ally_with = BAT
					is_ally_with = WHR
				}
			}
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 100 }
		}
		add_war_support = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
	
	}	
}
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1602
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1602" }
	title = rusfor.1602.t
	desc = rusfor.1602.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1602.a #Cease all contacts between the Völkerbund and Russia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		embargo_FROM = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = ROOT.faction_members
				RUS = { embargo_PREV = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1603
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1602.b #Back down, we cannot afford a conflict with Russia.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		trigger = {
			country_exists = FRA
		}
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		add_political_power = -100		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1602.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				RUS = { 
					OR = {
						has_war_with = UKR
						has_war_with = FIN
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					date < 1938.1.1
					enemies_strength_ratio > 0.8
					surrender_progress > 0
					strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.0 }
					FROM = {
						is_subject = yes
						overlord = {
							strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.8 }
						}
					}
					FROM = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						faction_leader = {
							strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.8 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1603
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1603" }
	title = rusfor.1603.t
	desc = rusfor.1603.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1603.a #I WILL SURVIVE
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_ideas = rus_ceased_contacts_germany
		RUS_remove_riga_accords = yes
	}	
}

news_event = { #Reds Win Civil War
	id = russianews.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.5" }
	title = russianews.5.t
	desc = russianews.5.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_soviet_russia

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.5.a
	}
}

	id = russianews.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.7" }
	title = russianews.7.t
	desc = russianews.7.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_second_russian_civil_war

		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
			tag = SOV
			tag = TRM
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.7.a
	}
}

news_event = { # Tsardom Restored
	id = russianews.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.8" }
	title = russianews.8.t
	desc = russianews.8.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_tsardom_restored

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.8.a
	}
}

		wants_world_news = yes
	}

		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.9.a
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.9.b
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}
}

news_event = { #Elections
	id = russianews.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.11" }
	title = russianews.11.t
	desc = russianews.11.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_moscow

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.11.a
		trigger = {
			RUS = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.11.b
		trigger = {
			RUS = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = no }
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.11.c
		trigger = {
			RUS = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = no }
			RUS = { NOT = { has_government = social_democrat } }
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}
}

###Russia Totalist Events added by Yaroslav007###

country_event = { #dictator tukhachevsky
	id = russoc.212
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.212" }
	title = russoc.212.t
	desc = russoc.212.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_SOV_tukhachevsky_event

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.212.a
		add_political_power = 150
		add_stability = 0.10
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tukhachevsky
		set_party_name = { 
			ideology = totalist 
			long_name = SOV_tukh_party_long 
			name = SOV_tukh_party 
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			SOV_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_hog_tot
			SOV_Iona_Yakir_for_tot
			SOV_Ieronim_Uborevich_eco_tot
			SOV_Vitaliy_Primakov_sec_tot
		}
		#hidden_effect = {
		#	news_event = { id = russianews.109 days = 7 }
		#}
	}
}

country_event = { #world revolution
	id = russoc.213
	title = russoc.213.t
	desc = russoc.213.d
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.213" }
	picture = GFX_report_event_SOV_world_revolution

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.213.a
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}

country_event = { #dictator frunze
	id = russoc.215
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.215" }
	title = russoc.212.t
	desc = russoc.215.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.212.a
		add_political_power = 150
		add_stability = 0.10
		set_party_name = { 
			ideology = totalist 
			long_name = SOV_frunze_party_long 
			name = SOV_frunze_party
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			SOV_Mikhail_V_Frunze_hog_tot
			SOV_Robert_P_Eydeman_for_tot
			SOV_Avgust_I_Kork_eco_tot
			SOV_Vladimir_Antonov_Ovseyenko_sec_tot
		}
		#hidden_effect = {
		#	news_event = { id = russianews.109 days = 7 }
		#}
	}
}
country_event = { #autonomoism
	id = russoc.216
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.216" }
	title = russoc.216.t
	desc = russoc.216.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.216.a
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = UKR
					tag = WHR
					tag = DKB
					tag = KUB
					tag = ALO
					tag = MTR
					tag = TRK
					tag = KYR
					tag = UZB
					tag = MON
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SOV_AUT
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #cultural revolution
	id = russoc.217
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.217" }
	title = russoc.217.t
	desc = russoc.217.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.217.a
		set_country_flag = SOV_cultural_revolution_ongoing
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = SOV_Cultural_Revolution
		SOV_setup_cultural_revolution = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Savinkov Portrait
	id = russia.10000
	title = russia.10000.t 
	desc = russia.10000.d 
	picture = GFX_Savinkov_Portrait_Event

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov3.png"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov4.png"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov2.png"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov.png"
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.f
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #force RUS to collapse if the war drags on too long
	id = russia.1919
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1919 FROM = [From.GetName]" }

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
		SOV = { is_ai = yes }
		surrender_progress > 0
	}

	option = {
		force_capitulate = yes
	}
}

	id = russia.1920

		is_ai = yes
		TRM = { is_ai = yes }
		surrender_progress > 10
	}

	option = {
		force_capitulate = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #soviet generals
	id = russia.1923
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1919 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russia.1923.t
	desc = russia.1923.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.1923.a
		ai_chance = { base = 90 }
		bolsheviks_gome_home = yes
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			ENG = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 1955 }
					set_nationality = ROOT
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = russia.1925
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 1954 }
					set_nationality = ROOT
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = russia.1924
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1923.b
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
		hidden_effect = {
			ENG = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 1955 }
					set_nationality = ROOT
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = russia.1924
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 1954 }
					set_nationality = ROOT
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = russia.1925
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #soviet generals
	id = russia.1924
	title = russia.1924.t
	desc = russia.1924.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.1924.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 1954 }
			remove_unit_leader_trait = SOV_bolshevik_officer
			set_nationality = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1924.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 15
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 1954 }
			set_nationality = FRA
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Peterburg 
	id = russia.2006
	title = russia.2006.t
	desc = russia.2006.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Gorod_na_Neve_event

	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #a great idea!
		name = russia.2006.a

		set_province_name = { id = 6174 name = "Sankt-Peterburg"}
		195 = { set_state_name = "Sankt-Peterburg" }
	}
	option = { #
		name = russia.2006.b


	}
}

country_event = { #Rumors of a monarchist plot in the Military
	id = rusdroz.56
	title = rusdroz.56.t 
	desc = rusdroz.56.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_civilwar_over_event
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #those are just rumors
		name = rusdroz.56.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #purge them
		name = rusdroz.56.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_ALONE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdroz.57
				days = 8
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Drozdovsky Takes Over!
	id = rusdroz.57
	title = rusdroz.57.t 
	desc = rusdroz.57.d 
	picture = GFX_PLC_beck_military_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #omg!
		name = rusdroz.57.a
		remove_power_balance = { id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict }
		add_ideas = rus_silent_darkness
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 402 }
			retire = yes
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 405 }
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 411 }
			remove_unit_leader_trait = RUS_kornilov_officer
			add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Nikanor_V_Savic_eco_pau
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_sec_ade
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		clr_country_flag = RUS_dictatorship
		set_country_flag = RUS_DROZ
		kill_country_leader = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Drozdovsky"
			desc = "POLITICS_DROZDOVSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Drozdovsky.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Drozdovsky"
			desc = "POLITICS_DROZDOVSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Drozdovsky.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = militarism_subtype
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = "National Stabilization Regime"
			name = "Klika Drozdovskogo"
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no   
		}
	}
	
}

country_event = { #meeting with Markov II
	id = rusdroz.4
	title = rusdroz.4.t 
	desc = rusdroz.4.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_markov2_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #agree on his terms
		name = rusdroz.4.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = { BlackHundredsStrenght = 1 }
		add_political_power = -10
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.5

country_event = { #results of our initiative
	id = rusdroz.7
	title = rusdroz.7.t 
	desc = { text = rusdroz.7.d_success trigger = { check_variable = { InitiativeFailed = 2 } } }
	desc = { text = rusdroz.7.d_fail trigger = { check_variable = { InitiativeFailed < 2 } } }
	picture = GFX_rus_russia_flag_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #agree on his terms
		name = rusdroz.7.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					InitiativeFailed = 2
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = Droz_Regiment_Path
			clr_country_flag = Droz_Monarchist_Path
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = MonarchistsUnited
			add_political_power = 50
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_rus_civilwar_over_event

		name = rusdroz.9.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				MON = {
					has_country_flag = MON_soyombo_in_power_flag
					is_subject_of = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_trait = RUS_denikin_officer }
			retire = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		set_country_flag = Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_dead
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.10
			days = 4
		}
	}
	option = { #YOU ARE GOING TO MONGOLIA
		name = rusdroz.9.b
		trigger = {
			MON = {
				has_country_flag = MON_soyombo_in_power_flag
				is_subject_of = RUS
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_trait = RUS_denikin_officer }
			set_nationality = MON
		}
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		set_country_flag = Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_dead
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.10
			days = 4
		}
	}

		set_variable = { AntiDrozdovitesPlot = 1 }
		country_event = {

country_event = { #purges check
	id = rusdroz.12
	title = rusdroz.12.t 
	desc = rusdroz.12.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_russia_flag_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #bruuh
		name = rusdroz.12.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					AntiDrozdovitesPlot = 3
				}
			}
			country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.13
			days = 4
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 50
			set_country_flag = Droz_PurgesComplete
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = "National Stabilization Regime"
				name = "Klika Drozdovskogo"
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.3
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = national_populist
				elections_allowed = no	}
		
		}
	}
}

				remove_core_of = RRF

			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_ideas = rus_black_hundreds
	}
	}

country_event = { #All Russian Popular Union
	id = rusdroz.47
	title = rusdroz.47.t 
	desc = rusdroz.47.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_droz1_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = rusdroz.47.a
		add_ideas = rus_arpu
		add_political_power = 150
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = "Vserossiyskiy Narodniy Soyuz (All-Russian Popular Union)"
			name = "VNS"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = "Vserossiyskiy Narodniy Soyuz (All-Russian Popular Union)"
			name = "VNS"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = "Vserossiyskiy Narodniy Soyuz (All-Russian Popular Union)"
				name = "VNS"
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_Purishkevich_dead
					has_country_flag = Droz_Purishkevich_Failed
				}
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_hog_pau
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_sec_pau
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = Droz_Markov_Failed
				}
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Nikolay_E_Markov_hog_npo
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
				RUS_Nikolay_P_Vladimir_sec_pau
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #choose
	id = rusdroz.63
	title = rusdroz.63.t 
	desc = rusdroz.63.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_droz1_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #Boris
		name = rusdroz.63.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_Monarch 
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_BORIS
				}
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Boris II"
			desc = "POLITICS_BORIS_ROMANOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_I.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = militarism_subtype
			traits = { RUS_shade_of_brother }
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = rusdroz.63.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_Monarch 
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_ROMAN
				}
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Roman I"
			desc = "POLITICS_ROMAN_ROMANOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Roman_I.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = militarism_subtype
			traits = { RUS_poor_health }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #abakumov purge
	id = russia.450
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.450"}
	title = russia.450.t
	desc = russia.450.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_abakumov
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #kill
		name = russia.450.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_abakumov_purge
			days = 200
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #the funny
	id = russia.36589
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.36589"}
	title = russia.36589.t
	desc = russia.36589.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Kerensky2
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date > 2000.01.01
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
		}
	}

	option = { #black and yellow
		name = russia.36589.a
		add_political_power = 50000
	}
	
}
